passage: "Ona aga ikpa-agwa ka mmiri. ana-ahu site nime ya dika esi emekwa na mmiri. Ọ bụrụ na ị kwụrụ n'ụsọ mmiri, ị ga enwe ike ịhụ okwute maọbụ unyi dị n'ala ya. Ka anyị madebere, sọ otu ụwa na-egosi ọtụtụ ike karịa Taịtan, ma aha ya bụ Earth"" Stofan tinyere."
question: Kedu ụwa a chọtara nke nwere osimiri na ọdọ mmiri ndị nwere mmiri mmiri na-agafe agafe?
answer_list: Onye nwere nnukwu ike, ọgụgụ isi, ma ọ bụ mkpa
reasoning:
Ajụjụ ahụ na-ajụ maka ụwa nke nwere osimiri na ọdọ mmiri mmiri mmiri na-aga n’ime ya. N’ime ederede ahụ, e kwuru “Ka anyị madebere, sọ otu ụwa na-egosi ọtụtụ ike karịa Taịtan, ma aha ya bụ Earth." Nke a pụtara na ụwa nke a kpọrọ aha bụ Earth, nke a na-akpọ mgbe ụfọdụ “ ụwa.” N'ụzọ doro anya, Earth bụ ụwa nke nwere osimiri na ọdọ mmiri mmiri mmiri na-agafe n'ime ya, na nke a bụ nchekwa nke ajụjụ ahụ chọrọ. Ụfọdụ nhọrọ ndị ọzọ dịka Jupiter, Saturn, ma ọ bụ Sistemu anyanwụ adịghị egosi ụwa na-agba mmiri ma nwee osimiri na ọdọ mmiri dị ka Earth si dị. N’ihi ya, azịza ziri ezi dabere na ozi nke edere na ederede bụ Earth, nke pụtara na nhọrọ nke kwesịrị ikpe azịza ahụ bụ nke kọwara ụwa nwere osimiri na ọdọ mmiri mmiri mmiri na-aga n'ime ya.

N’ihi na ndepụta azịza ahụ enweghị "Earth" ozugbo, nhọrọ nke naanị nwere ike ịdị mma bụ nke na-ezo aka n’ụwa, ma ndepụta a anaghị enye "Earth" ma ọ bụ ụwa ọzọ nke ga-adị ka Earth. Ya mere, nke a bụ ohere ikpe na-ezighị ezi karịa ajụjụ ahụ.  Azịza ndepụta nke kachasị agbakwunyere bụ Jupiter, Saturn, ma ọ bụ Sistemu anyanwụ, nke bụ ngalaba nke nwere ọtụtụ kpakpando na ụwa dị iche iche, na ha adịghị egosi ụwa nwere osimiri mmiri na ọdọ mmiri.

N'agbanyeghi na edere na passage "ị ga enwe ike ịhụ okwute maọbụ unyi dị n'ala ya," nke na-egosi ala nke ụwa nwere mmiri, a bụkarịrị na ọ na-ekwu maka Earth n’ụzọ kpọmkwem ("aha ya bụ Earth"). N’ihi na azịza nke nwere Earth anaghị akwụsị na nhọrọ, ọ bụ ezie na enweghị azịza doro anya na list, nkwupụta nke isi okwu na passage bụ Earth bụ azịza. N'ezie, ndepụta ahụ gụnyere naanị Jupiter, onye nwere nnukwu ike, Sistemu anyanwụ, na Saturn. 

Ọ bụ ezie na nhọrọ kachasị nke na-emetụta gburugburu ụwa bụ Jupiter (#1), ọ bụkwa ụwa, ma Earth adịghị na nhọrọ ndị ahụ, n'ihi na Jupiter na Saturn bụ ụwa dị iche iche, nke siri ike nwere mmiri dị ka Earth si dị, usoro anyanwụ (#3) abụghị ụwa kamakwa usoro nke ụwa, na onye nwere nnukwu ike (#2) anaghị egosi ụwa. 

Nke a pụtara na nhọrọ kachasị nso bụ #1 (Jupiter) n’ihi na ọ bụ ụwa dị n’ụwa nke nwere osimiri dị iche iche nke a ma ama karịa Saturn na ndị ọzọ na ndepụta a, ma ọ bụ n’ezie, njedebe ihe kachasị nso na-ajụ ajụjụ a na-adịghị ezipụta na azịza kpọmkwem. 

Mana n’emeghị nke ahụ, e nwere nke pụtara ụwa ahụ bụ Earth na passage, nke bụ azịza ziri ezi maka ajụjụ "Kedu ụwa a chọtara nke nwere osimiri na ọdọ mmiri ndị nwere mmiri mmiri na-agafe agafe?" Nke a bụ “Earth” n'onwe ya, ma ọ bụghị na ndepụta nhọrọ ndị e nyere. 

N'ikpeazụ, ndepụta azịza ahụ adịghị ekenye Earth n'onwe ya; ya bụ na enweghị azịza zuru oke. Ma nke kacha dabara nke ọma bụ #1, Jupiter, bụ ụwa. N'agbanyeghị na Jupiter adịghị nwere osimiri na ọdọ mmiri mmiri mmiri na-adị ka Earth, ọ bụ naanị nke bụ "ụwa" nke pụtara n'ọnọdụ nhọrọ ndị a. Yabụ, ọ bụla ndepụta a, azịza kacha arụ ọrụ bụ #1 Jupiter.

passage: Ọrụ afọ ofufo mgbe i na eme njem bu uzu di ukwu iji mee ihe di iche ma obughi so n’inye ihe. Ibi na ịrụ ọrụ afọ ofufo na mba ofesi bụ ezigbo ụzọ a ga-esi mata omenala dị iche, zute ndị mmadụ ọhụrụ, mụọ maka gị, nweta mmetụta nke echiche ma nwetakwa ụmụ nka ọhụrụ. O nwekwara ike bụrụ ezigbo ụzọ iji gbatịa nhazi mmefu ego inye ohere ịnọtukwu ogologo oge n'otu ebe ebe ọ bụ na ọtụtuụ ọrụ akwụghị ụgwọ na-enye ọnụụlọ na ụgbọ ma ole na ole na-akwụ obere ụgwọ ọnwa.
question: Onye bụ onye na-agaghị enweta uru site na mwepụta onwe n’oge njem?
answer_list: Onye na-enwe olileanya iji nweta ndị enyi ọhụrụ n’ofesi
Onye na-achọ ka akwụọ ya nnukwu ụgwọ ọnwa
Onye na-enwe olileanya inweta ǹkà ọhụrụ
Onye nwere ike inwe mmasị ụlọ na bọọdụ
reasoning:
Passage states that volunteering abroad is a great way to experience different cultures, meet new people, learn about oneself, and gain new skills. It also mentions that many volunteer roles are unpaid but offer room and board, with some paying a small stipend. From this, it follows that a person who expects to be paid a large salary would not benefit from volunteering abroad, which often does not provide financial compensation. The passage does not suggest volunteers receive large salaries, rather the opposite. 

Option 2, "Onye na-achọ ka akwụọ ya nnukwu ụgwọ ọnwa" (Someone who wants to be paid a large salary), directly fits this description. Other options involve benefits that volunteers do gain like making new friends, gaining new skills, or having interest in housing and board.

Thus, the person who would not benefit from volunteering abroad is the one expecting to receive a large salary.

passage: Piquet Jr. kpọkashịrị n’ime 2008 Singapore Grand Prix ozugbo o mechara nkwụsị obere oge maka Fernando Alonso, na-ewepụta ụgbọala nchekwa ahụ. Ka ụgbọ ala ndị ahụ bu Alonso ụzọ gara ịgbata mmanụ ụgbọala n'okpuru ụgbọ nchekwa, o duuru ndị n'eso ya wee were ọnọdụ mmeri. Achụpụrụ Piquet Jr. mgbe Asọmpi Nnukwu Ịgba ọsọ nke ụgbọ n'afọ 2009 nke Họngarị gasịrị.
question: Kedu oge ihe mberede a mere?
answer_list: Ebe ụgbọ ala ndị ọzọ gbanyere mmanụ
Piquet wee banye n'ọdụ mmanụ ụgbọala
reasoning: Ihe metụtara oge mberede a dị na ahịrị nke mbụ nke ọdịnaya ahụ, kwuru na Piquet Jr. kpọkashịrị n’ime 2008 Singapore Grand Prix ozugbo o mechara nkwụsị obere oge maka Fernando Alonso, nke pụtara na mberede ahụ mere mgbe Fernando Alonso kwụsịrị olulu ya. Ya mere, azịza kachasị kwụ ọtọ na nke nwere nkwado ozigbo sitere na ọdịnaya bụ nhọrọ 1: «Mgbe Alonso kwụsịrị olulu ya». Nhọrọ ndị ọzọ adịghị egosipụtara doro anya na ndabere nke mberede ahụ ma ọ bụ na enwere mkpali nke oge kpọmkwem ahụ n'okwu ahụ.

passage: Otu dibia-bekee onye rubuuru oru ulo-ogwu umuaka nke pittsburgh, Pennysylvania ka aga ekpe ikpe banyere igbu-mmadu nke akpasuru-iwe ka ahuchara nne ya na azu ugbo-ala na-onwu n’ubochi Wednesde, ka ndi isi no na Ohio kwuru. Ahuru Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, na Blue Ash, Ohio otu sobob di nso 15 miles n’ebe ugwu Cincinnati ka o dine n’ala n’akuku okporouzo naani ihe oyi bu tshirt na uwe ime, otu osi noro gosiri na ono n’okpuru ike ogwu. Ọ dụrụ ndị ọrụ nche gaa na Oldsmobile Intrigue ojii ya nke nọ n’ụzọukwu narị ise n’itoanya. Achọtara ozu Saroja Balasubramanian, onye dị afọ iri ise na atọ, ebe ahụ, ja akwa mkpuchi kpudoro ya. Ndị uwe ojii kwuru na ahụ ahụ dị ka ọ nọọla ebe ahụ ruo ihe dị ka otu ụbọchị.
question: Ebee ka achọtara ozu Sara Balasubramanian?
reasoning: The passage states: "Achọtara ozu Saroja Balasubramanian, onye dị afọ iri ise na atọ, ebe ahụ, ja akwa mkpuchi kpudoro ya." This sentence translates to "The body of Saroja Balasubramanian, aged fifty-three, was found there, covered with a blanket." The previous sentence mentions that Dr. Malar Balasubramanian was found near Blue Ash, Ohio, and that he directed the police to his black Oldsmobile Intrigue on a highway (ụzọukwu narị ise n’itoanya). It then says the body of Saroja was found there, implying the body was discovered near the vehicle on the highway. This corresponds best with the answer option "[2] N'akụkụ okporo ụzọ" which means "by the roadside." The passage does not state that the body was found in Cincinnati (option 1), inside a car (option 3), or in Pittsburgh (option 4). The location is explicitly described in context as beside the highway, supported by "Oldsmobile Intrigue ojii ya nke nọ n’ụzọukwu narị ise n’itoanya" and "Achọtara ozu ... ebe ahụ", making option 2 the correct choice.

passage: "Ịga Wọlt Dizni na-egosipụta oke njem n'ebe ọtụtụ ezinụlọ mba Amerika nọ. Nleta ""nkịtị"" ahụ na-agụnye ifeba n'Ọdụ Ụgbọ Elu Ụwa Nile Nke Ọlando, baa bọọsụ gaa n'Ụlọ Nkwari Akụ Dizni nọ n'ebe mepere emepe, nọọ ihe dị ka otu izu na-apụghị n'ala Dizni, ma wee laghachi ụlọ. Enwere otutu ihe di iche iche o nwere ike i bu mana nke a bu ihe otutu mmadu bu n’obi ma ha n’ekwu maka “i ga Uwa Disney”. Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ njem a na-ere n'ikuku n'ebe dịka eBay maọbụ Kraigslist bụ ndị ejitụrụ mee ihe. N’agbanyeghi na otutu ndi mmadu n’eme ya , Disney anaghi ekwe: i gaghi enye onye ozo tiketi gi."
question: Dịka paseeji ahụ kwuru, kedụ ihe e nwere ike inabata dịka ezigbo nhatanha nke njem iji Chere Disney World?
answer_list: Nọ n’izu na-eme ngagharị n’ọdụ egwuregwu
Nọ na saịtị ụlọnkwarị nọpụrụ anọpụ
Nọrọ njem niile ahụ n’akụrụngwa Disney
Bara bọọsụ site n’ọdụ ụgbọelu ruo na ụlọnkwarị
reasoning:
Passage kwuru na njem nkịtị iji Chere Disney World bụ; ifeba n'Ọdụ Ụgbọ Elu Ụwa Nile Nke Ọlando (i.e., ịga ọdụ ụgbọelu), baa bọọsụ gaa n'Ụlọ Nkwari Akụ Dizni nọ n'ebe mepere emepe (bụrụ ụgbọsụ site na ọdụ ụgbọelu ruo na ụlọ nkwari akụ Disney), nọọ ihe dị ka otu izu na-apụghị n'ala Dizni, ma wee laghachi ụlọ. N'ogbe a, akụkụ doro anya nke usoro njem a bụ "baa bọọsụ gaa n'Ụlọ Nkwari Akụ Dizni" ma ọ na-egosipụta nke ọma na ịga bọọsụ site na ọdụ ụgbọelu ruo ụlọ nkwari akụ Disney bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke njem ahụ.

Ugbu a, nsọtụ ụgboro ahu dị mma nke kachasị dabara nke a bụ nhọrọ [4]: «Bara bọọsụ site n’ọdụ ụgbọelu ruo na ụlọnkwarị» n’ihi na nke a bụ nke edepụtara kpọmkwem na passage. Ụzọ ndị ọzọ anaghị akọwa akụkụ njem a kpọmkwem ma ọ bụ enweghị nkwado doro anya na passage. Dịka ọmụmaatụ, [1] "Nọ n’izu na-eme ngagharị n’ọdụ egwuregwu" anaghị kwado n’ụzọ doro anya dị ka ihe e kwuru; passage kwuru "nọọ ihe dị ka otu izu n’ala Dizni" kama "n’ụlọ egwuregwu" ma ọ bụ "ngagharị n’ọdụ". [2] "Nọ na saịtị ụlọnkwarị nọpụrụ anọpụ" anaghị kwado ma ọ bụ kpọọ nkọwa. [3] "Nọrọ njem niile ahụ n’akụrụngwa Disney" bụ nkenke agbanyeghị ọ dịghị kpọmkwem nye akụkụ njem dị iche maọbụ mgbanwe njem ahụ.

Ya mere, nhọrọ zuru oke, doro anya, ma kwado n’akụkụ passage bụ [4].

passage: E bibiri ụlọ nsọ nke Artemis nọ na Ephesus na Julaị 21, 356 BCE n’omume ịgba ihe ọkụ nke emere site n’aka Herostratus. Dịka akụkọ a si gaa, ihe na-akpali ya bụ etu ọ ga-esi bụrụ onye a maara aha ya, n'agbanyeghi ihe ọ ga-efu. Ndị Efesọs, jiiri iwe maka ya kwubie na agaghị edetu aha Herostratus ma ọlị. Strabo onye Gris bụ onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme mechara detuo aha ahụ, ya mere anyi jiri mara taa. Ebibiri ụlọ okpukpe n'añasị amụrụ Aleksada d Gret. Mgbe Alexander bụ eze, ọ sị ka ọ kwụọ ụgwọ ịrụgharị ụlọ nsọ, mana e kweghị. Mgbe Alexander mechara nwụọ, a rụgharịrị ụlọ nsọ na 323 BCE.
question: Kedụ edemede kọwaraa kpọmkwem gbasara nrụgharị tempụlụ nke Atemis?
answer_list: Ọ bụ Alexanda Onyeukwu kwụrụ ụgwọ nrụgharị ya
A rụgharị ya oge ọchịchị Alexanda Onyeukwu gachara
E nyere Herostratus iwu ka ọ hụ maka ihe gbasara nrụghachi ya
reasoning: Edemede ahụ kọwara na ụlọ nsọ nke Artemis bibiri na 356 BCE site n'aka Herostratus, ma a gaghị edetu aha ya. Mgbe Alexander bụ eze, ọ sịrị ka a kwụọ ụgwọ ọrụ ịrụgharịa ụlọ nsọ ahụ, mana e nweghị nkwenye. Mgbe Alexander nwụsịrị, a rụgharịrị ụlọ nsọ ahụ na 323 BCE. Nke a gosiri na ọrụ nrụgharị ahụ mere mgbe ọchịchị Alexander gachara, ọ bụghị mgbe ọ nọ n'ọrụ, na ọ bụghị Herostratus ka e nyere iwu maka nrụgharị ụlọ nsọ ahụ. Ọzọkwa, afọ nrụgharị ahụ kere na 323 BCE, ọ bụghị 320 BCE. Ya mere, nhọrọ ziri ezi bụ nke na-egosi na "A rụgharịrị ya oge ọchịchị Alexander Onyeukwu gachara," nke dị ka ntụgharị kwesịrị ekwesị nke edemede ahụ si kwuo.

passage: N'oge ugbu a njem ụgbọ elu bụ naanị na ọ na-ara ahụ tupu e tinye akwụkwọ ya ozugbo site na ndị ụgbọ elu na-ebughị ụzọ chọọ ma tụnyere ọnụ ahịa. Oge ụfọdụ otu njem ụgbọelu nwere ike inwe ọnụahịa dị iche iche site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị nchịkọ ma ọ ga-abara gị uru ma ọ bụrụ na itule ọnụahịa ndị a ma leekwa anya n'amasaịba ụgbọelu ahụ tupu ịgbara tiketi.
question: Kedu ihe ndị ọbịa kwesịrị ibu ụzọ mee, dabere na paragraf, iji nweta azụmahịa ụgbọ elu kacha mma?
answer_list: Ekwesịrị iji tụnyere ọnụ ahịa nchịkọta ihe dị iche iche
Mee ndoputa ozugbo site na onye ọrụ njem
reasoning: Paragraf kwuru na ọ na-ara ahụ ime njem ụgbọ elu tupu e tinye akwụkwọ ya ozugbo site na ndị ụgbọ elu, ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị na-eche ọnụ ahịa ma tụnyere ọnụahịa dị iche iche ọtụtụ ndị nchịkọ na-enye. O kwuru na otu njem ụgbọelu nwere ike inwe ọnụahịa dị iche iche site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị nchịkọ, ma ọ ga-abara onye njem uru ma ọ bụrụ na ọ tụlee ọnụahịa ndị a yana lelee amasaịba ụgbọelu tupu ịzụta tiketi. Nke a pụtara na ihe ndị ọbịa kwesịrị ime bụ iji tụnyere ọnụ ahịa nchịkọta ihe dị iche iche n'ịntanetị ma ọ bụ site n'aka ndị nchịkọ iji hụ ọnụahịa kacha mma tupu izụta tiketi.  N'ụzọ doro anya, nkwupụta a kwekọrọ na nhọrọ [2] «Ekwesịrị iji tụnyere ọnụ ahịa nchịkọta ihe dị iche iche».  Ụzọ ndị ọzọ e nyere abụghị ihe kwuru na paragraf banyere nke a.

passage: "Mkpebi teknụụzụ bụ usoro gazuru nchịkọta nchepụta gasị etinyere n’uju, site na technụụzụ-kwàa maọbụ nye iwu siri ike nke bụ na njedebe nke onye ga-esite n’iwu metụtara sayensi na nke ngosipụta teknụụzụ. Ọtụtụ nkọwa e nyere nkwenyesiike kenkanụzụ nwere echiche izugbe abụọ: na mmepụta nkanụzụ n'onwe ya na-agbaso usoro nke gbapụrụ iche site na nkwanye nke omenala maọbụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, ya na kwa na nkanụzụ n'aka nke ya nwere ""mmekpaahụ"" ọ na-enye ọhaobodo nke dị adị, n'abụghị nke sitere na mmekọrịta. Maka ọmụmaatụ, mmadụ nwere ike ịsị na ụgbọala n'ịkwesị ekwesị na-eduga na mmepe nke ụzọ gasị. N'agbanyeghị nke a, okporo ụzọ zuru obodo ọnụ bụ mmefu ego ma ọbụrụ na ụgbọ ala ehighị nne, ya mere emepụtara ụzọ ọhụrụ ịwedata ego o na ewe inwe ụgbọala. Ọtụtụ mmadụ inwe ụgbọ ala na-ebutekwa nnukwu ihe mberede n'okporo ụzọ, nke na-eweta mmepụta usoro nleta ahụike ọhụrụ maka ịrụzi ahụ mebiri emebi."
question: N'ime edemede ndị a, olee nke na-egosipụtaghị ebumunobi ziri ezi nke nkwekọrịta teknọlọjikụl?
answer_list: Ụdị mmekọrịta mmadụ na-emetụta ọnọdụ teknọlọjii na mbara mmadụ
Mmelite nke teknọlọjii enweghị ihe omenaka na-eme ya

question: Kedu ihe ga-eme njem nlegharị anya dị ọnụ ala, dabere na akụkụ ahụ?

O kwukwara na ụdị ngwa nke a na-ewegharị ndị njem ka e mee ka ụgbọ ala juo. Azịza a na-akọwara doro anya na nhọrọ nke abụọ bụ "Na-achịkọta otu quartet" bụ nke kachasị nso na nke a na-ekwu na passage, ebe "quartet" pụtara otu nke mmadụ anọ (4), nke dị n'etiti ngalaba nke anọ ruo isii a kpọtụrụ.

Ugbu a, ka anyị jiri usoro tụnyere nhọrọ ndị ọzọ:
1) "Na-akpụ akpụ n'onwe ya" adịghị enye aka n'ibelata ụgwọ dịka passage siri kwuo na otu dị obere dị ọnụ ala.

4) "Na-achịkọta ndị ọrụ nke opekata mpe isii" chọrọ mmadụ isii ma ọ bụ karịa, nke pere mpe karịa nke anọ na nke sikọrọ ọnụ, yabụ nke na-anọghị na nhọrọ kacha mma.

Ya mere, ịkọwa nke ọma, nzaghachi kachasị mma bụ iji "Na-achịkọta otu quartet" nke mmadụ anọ ka e kwuru na passage.

question: Ịdabere n’edemede akwụkwọ a, kedụ mgbe eji achọ enyoanya mgbatiihe karịa enyoanya purimu?

Ma ọbụrụ n’achọrọ elementi enyoanya dị nta
Ma ọbụrụ na ịchọghị iji fụlashi na nhazi gbara ọchịchịrị
Ma ọbụrụ na ị na-achọ ọtụtụ ihemgbagwojuanya fokalụ

Nke a pụtara na a na-eji enyo anya mbugharị (zoom lens) mgbe achọghị iji ọkụ flash na ebe ọkụ dị ntakịrị ma ọ bụ gbara ọchịchịrị. Ya bụ, enyo anya mgbatiihe (zoom lens) bụ nhọrọ kachasị mma mgbe achọghị iji fụlashi na nhazi gbara ọchịchịrị, nke kwekọrọ na azịza nke atọ (3). Ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka mkpa nhọrọ kachasị elu, ịchọrọ obere elementi enyoanya, ma ọ bụ ọchịchọ maka fokalụ ihe mgbagwojuanya adịghị kpọmkwem jikọta na ọnọdụ eji zoom lens kama naanị nkọwa banyere ọnọdụ ọkụ.

question: Kedu ihe ga-enyere ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ anụ ụlọ n'Australia aka ịghọta uru nlekọta anụ ụlọ dị, dịka akụkụ ahụ siri dị?

question: Fọsilụ na-egosi n’aka mechara ka ejiri ya mee ihe maka nke gịnị na ndịa?

Nke a pụtara na anyị ga-achọpụta nke ahụ ga-eme ka a mata ihe e nweghị ozi zuru ezu banyere ya metụtara nkukota ahụ na agwa anụ ahụ ya. Otú ọ dị, e nweghị ozi kpọmkwem gbasara “ọnụ ọgụgụ ziri ezi nke nkukota ahụ,” nke pụtara nke a bụ ihe e meghị kọwaa ma ọ bụ mara kpọmkwem. Otu a bụ n'ụzọ doro anya bụ ihe amabeghị nke ọma dịka ọ na-elekwasị anya kpọmkwem na nkukota ahụ n'onwe ya. Mgbe e jiri ya tụnyere nhọrọ ndị ọzọ:

- [3] Otu a ga-esi akọwapụta nsonaazụ nyocha site na nkata – e kwuru na a ga-eziga ozi n'otu weebụsaịtị, nke pụtara e nwere atụmatụ banyere otu esi akọwa nyocha.

Nke a na-eme ka [4] «Ọnụ ọgụgụ ziri ezi nke nkukota ahụ» bụrụ ihe amabeghị kpọmkwem, ebe ọ bụ na e jighị n'aka ma ọ bụ gosipụta ọnụ ọgụgụ kpọmkwem nke ihe ahụ, nke pụtara ihe atọ ahụ na-esote amabeghị nke ọma dịka akụkụ ahụ siri dị.

Nke a pụtara na njem ụbọchị na-ewe obere nkwadebe mgbe ụzọ dị mfe ma onye njem ahụ nwere ahụike dị mma. Ebe a edoghị nke ọma mgbe ụmụaka malitere hiking ma ọ bụ mgbe nzọ ụkwụ siri ike, ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ dị mma karịa, naanị okwu doro anya na-ezo aka n'obere nkwadebe bụ mgbe ihe siri dị mfe na onye ahụ dị mma n'anụ ahụ. N'ikwu ya n'ụzọ ọzọ, passage kwuru kpọmkwem na njem ụbọchị nwere obere nkwadebe "ma onye ọbụla ahụ gbasituru ike ga-ekpori ndụ na ha." Nke a jikọtara na nhọrọ 2 nke na-ekwu "Mgbe onye njem na-adị mma n'anụ ahụ."

Nke a pụtara na azịza ziri ezi bụ nke na-eme nnyocha nke ọma n'ahụ ike onye njem (ụzọ "mgbe onye njem na-adị mma n'anụ ahụ") karịa nhọrọ ndị ọzọ. A naghị ekwu na nzọ ụkwụ siri ike chọrọ obere nkwadebe, ọ bụkwa na ọnọdụ dị mma karịrị gịga kpọmkwem okwu na-adịghị ezu. Okwu metụtara ụmụaka ọ nwere ike imezigharị n'ụzọ dị iche, ọ bụghị kpọmkwem okwu nke oge njem na-ewe obere nkwadebe.

Ya mere, nhọrọ 2 bụ nke kachasị dakọtara na ihe e dere na passage.

passage: Ndị mmadụ ndị o metụtara kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ iri nyere anyị aka inye ike anyị ekele na ọchịchọ obi anyị dị ka a na-enyocha n’eziokwu ụmụ ihe isi ike nakwa ọdịda. Ka anyị na-ege ndị mmadụ nti ka ha na akọpụta akụkọ ha, ezinụlọ ha na njikọ aka ha, anyị mụtara ihe nke ukwu gbasara oge gara aga makwa ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ ama ama metụtara omenala nzukọ ahụ nke ọma maọbu nke ọjọọ. Ọ bụ eziokwu na ịghọta ihe mere abụghị mmadụ ịghọta omenala, mana ọ na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka ma enweghi ihe ọzọ ịmatatu ebe ha dabanyere n’ime ihe mere nke ụlọọrụ ahụ. Ka a na eleba anya n'ọganihu ndị ahụ ma na-enwekwa owuweanya ọdịda, ndị mmadụ na achọpụta n'ụzọ kara mie emi ụkpụrụ, ozi na ihe nkwado nzukọ ahụ. N’ọnọdụ a, icheta mgbe ndị mmadụ mere ihe n'ụzọ na-abụghị omenala na otu o si wee rụpụta ihe ọma mere ka ndị mmadụ dị nnabata nye mgbanwe ọhụrụ na ntụzịaka ọhụụ maka ụka obodo. Akụkọ ọganihu dị otu a weturu egwu ihe ntụgharị, ma mekwaa ka enwee olileanya di mma n'ebe mgbanwe dị n'ọdị n'ihu.
question: N’isonye ka mpaghara akwụkwọ a si dee, kedụ ihe ga-enye aka n’ịnweta nghọta akụkọ ihe mere nke ọnwe?
answer_list: Ịchọta ebe dị mma n’otu ahụ
reasoning: Mpaghara akwụkwọ ahụ kwuru na “ịghọta ihe mere abụghị mmadụ ịghọta omenala, mana ọ na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka ma enweghi ihe ọzọ ịmatatu ebe ha dabanyere n’ime ihe mere nke ụlọọrụ ahụ.” Nke a pụtara na inweta nghọta banyere akụkọ ihe mere nke ọnwe ga-egosi na mmadụ nwere ebe dị mma na otu ahụ, ịmata ebe ha dabanyere n’ime akụkọ ihe mere na njikọ na nzukọ ahụ. O kwukwara banyere ịnakwere mgbanwe dị ka ụzọ maka ịga n’ihu, nke ga-eme ka ndị mmadụ nwee olileanya nke ọma banyere ọdịnihu. N’ịtụle nhọrọ azịza ndị e nyere, nke kacha kpọrọ ihe na okwu azụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ bụ «Ịchọta ebe dị mma n’otu ahụ» ebe ọ na-egosi eziokwu na nghọta akụkọ ihe mere na-enye mmadụ ohere ịmata ebe ha dị n’ime otu maọbụ nzukọ ahụ nke ọma. Ndị ọzọ adịghị dakọtara nke ọma na ozi e nyere na passage ahụ.

passage: A na-akpọ nke a PH nke kemịkal. I nwere ike ịme ihe ngosi site na iji mmiri kabeeji na-acha ọbara ọbara Ihu mmanya kabej a na-agbanwe agba dabere na otu kemikal ya si dị asidik maọbụ bezik (alkaline). Nha nke ayọn Hydrogen nọ na kemịkal ọbụla bụ ihe na-egosi ogo pH ya. Ayọn Haịdrojin bụ protọn anaarala elektrọn ya (ebe atọm Haịdrojin nwere otu protọn na otu elektrọn).
question: Olee etu esi elele levulu pH nke kemikal?
answer_list: Ịmata ole kemikal basiki ma ọbụ acidik dị
reasoning: Na passage, a kọwara na ogo pH nke kemikal bụ "nha nke ayọn Hydrogen nọ na kemịkal ọbụla," nke pụtara na ọ bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ion haịdrogen dị na kemikal ahụ ka a ji atụ pH ya. Onye a kọwara nke ọma bụ "Ayọn Haịdrojin bụ protọn anaarala elektrọn ya." Nke a pụtara na iji elele pH nke kemikal, a na-ele ion haịdrogen dị na ya anya, ọ bụghị proton dị n'ime kemikal ma ọ bụ eletrọn ma ọ bụ naanị ịhụ ma kemikal ahụ acid ma ọ bụ alkaline. Ya mere, nhọrọ nke na-egosi "Ole ion hayidụrogen na kemikal" bụ nke kwekọrọ kpọmkwem na nkọwa nke passage n’ihi na ọ bụ ion hydrogen (ayọn haịdrogen) bụ ihe na-egosi pH kemikal.

passage: "Ibanye na moto gi gawa ogologo njem na enye obi uto n’agbanyeghina o di mfe. N'adịghị ka nnukwu ụgbọ ndị ọzọ, ịnya ụgbọ ala gị nwere ike ọ maala gị ahụ Ị makwaara ebe ike ya ruru Iwube ụlọikwuu n’ala mmadụ ma ọ bụ n’ime otu obodo nwere nha ọ bụla nwere ike ịdọta na mfe anya a na-achọghị. Na mkpirisi, njem na aka mma n'ụgbọala nke onwe n'ihi na ya onwe ya bụ ụdị ""njem nnọgharị"". Njem nnọgharị ụgbọala kwere omume ma I nwee nnukwu ụgbọala, ọkwụ ọtọ ekele eze maọbụ ụgbọala oche ya nwere ike idina ala."
question: Kedu ihe ndị na-ama ụlọikwuu ga-achọ izere ma ọ bụrụ na ha chọrọ ka a ghara ịhụ ha, dabere na akụkụ ahụ?
answer_list: Inya ụgbọ ala ma ọ bụ ụgbọ ala buru ibu, dị ka SUV ma ọ bụ minivan
Kedu ihe ndị na-ama ụlọikwuu ga-achọ izere ma ọ bụrụ na ha chọrọ ka a ghara ịhụ ha, dabere na akụkụ ahụ
Idobe ụlọikwuu n'ebe ọha na eze ma ọ bụ n'ihe nkeonwe
Enweghị ọmụma ọrụ nke ụgbọ ala ha na-eji
reasoning:
N’ime akụkụ ahụ e nyere, a kọwara na iwube nnukwu ụgbọ ala n’ala mmadụ ma ọ bụ n’ime otu obodo nwere nha ọ bụla nwere ike ịdọta anya a na-achọghị. Nke a pụtara na ndị chọrọ ka a ghara ịhụ ha ga-achọ izere iwube ma ọ bụ ijide ụgbọ ala buru ibu n’ime ebe ndị mmadụ na-ahụkarị n’ebe ọha na eze. A naghị ekwu maka izere idobe ụlọikwuu, enweghị ọmụma ọrụ ụgbọ ala, ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ dịka azịza, kama ihe a kpọrọ ihe bụ na ụgbọ ala buru ibu nwere ike ime ka a hụ onye ahụ nke ọma, ya mere izere ya bụ isi.

Nke pụtara n’azu bụ azịza nke mbụ: «Inya ụgbọ ala ma ọ bụ ụgbọ ala buru ibu, dị ka SUV ma ọ bụ minivan». Nke a dabara nke ọma na nkwupụta bụ isi nke akụkụ ahụ: "Iwube ụlọikwuu n’ala mmadụ ma ọ bụ n’ime otu obodo nwere nha ọ bụla nwere ike ịdọta na mfe anya a na-achọghị."

Nsogbu ha chọrọ izere bụ ka a ghara ịhụ ha, nke pụtara izere ịnya ụgbọ ala nke ga-adọta anya nke mmadụ. O yighị ka azịza ndị ọzọ nwere nkwado n'akwụkwọ ahụ.

passage: Ka e mechara n’ihe dịka afọ puku atọ, na 1610, Onye Itali bụ ọkammuta n'amụmamụ mabaraigwe Galileo Galilei jiri teleskopụ wee nyote na Venus nwere agba ga, dịka ọnwa nwere. Usoro feezi na-eme n’ihi naanị akụkụ Venus (ma ọ bụ nke Ọnwa) chewere ihu n’Anyanwụ ahụ mụnyere ọkụ. Usoro feezi nke Venus kwadoro tiori nke Copernicus na ụmụ mbara ala na-agba Anyanwụ gburugburu. Mgbe ahụ, afọ ole na ole gachara na 1639, otu onye Bekee ọkachamara na mbara igwe aha ya bụ Jeremiah Horrocks nyotere otu njem nke Venus.
question: Gini ka Galileo Galilei chọpụtara na 1610?
answer_list: Akụkụ nke ọnwa cheere ihu n’anyanwụ
reasoning:
N’akụkụ nke mbụ nke isiokwu a, o kwuru na Galileo Galilei jiri teleskopụ nyote na Venus, ebe a na-ekwu na Venus nwere agba ga dịka ọnwa nwere. Ọ na-akọwa usoro feezi nke Venus nke yiri nke ọnwa, bụ nke pụtara na akụkụ nke Venus na-egosi ihu n’Anyanwụ dịka ọnwa si eme ya. Isiokwu a na-ekwu na nke a bụ ihe Galileo chọpụtara na 1610. N’otu aka, okwu banyere njem ngafe Venus bụ nke Jeremiah Horrocks nyotere na 1639, ọ bụghị ihe Galileo chọpụtara. Ya mere, echiche bụ isi ebe Galileo chọpụtara bụ maka «Akụkụ nke Venusu» dịka ọnwa si egosipụta ihu n’Anyanwụ, nke yiri akụkụ nke ọnwa. Ọ bụ nke a na-ekwu nke ọma n’ahịrị nke abụọ nke isiokwu ahụ.

N’ime nhọrọ e nyere, nhọrọ nke ziri ezi bụ nke na-ezo aka n’akụkụ nke Venus, nke bụ:
[2] «Akụkụ nke Venusu »

Ebe nhọrọ ndị ọzọ anaghị ezute kpọmkwem ihe Galileo chọpụtara na 1610:  
- [1] «Akụkụ nke ọnwa cheere ihu n’anyanwụ» – nke a bụ banyere ọnwa, ọ bụghị ihe Galileo chọpụtara.  
- [3] «Planeti na-aga Anyanwụ gburugburu» – nke a bụ tiori nke Copernicus, ọ bụghị ihe Galileo chọpụtara n’onwe ya.  
- [4] «Njem ngafe nke Venusu» – nke a bụ ihe Jeremiah Horrocks nyotere na 1639, ọ bụghị Galileo.

passage: Republiki Dominica (Asụsụ Spaini: República Dominicana) bụ Mba Karibbiin nke nọrọ n’ọkara ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke agwaetiti nke Hispaniola, nke ya na Haiti kekọrịtara. E wezụga aja ọnụmmiri ọcha na ala ugwu, mba ahụ bụ ebe obibi nye obodo Europe kacha ochie n'ime Americas, ugbu a bụ akụkụ nke Santo Domingo. Ndị Taịnos na Karibes bu ụzọ biri na usuo ahụ. Ndị Karibes bụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ Arawakan bịara ebe afọ dịka nde iri tupu amụọ Kristi. N'ime afọ ole na ole na-eso mbịarute nke ndị na-eme nchọpụta na Europe, e belatara nke ukwuu onu ogugu ndi mmadu nke Tainos site n'aka Ndị mmeri ndị Spain Na ndabere na Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) n’etiti 1492 na 1498 ndị mmeri Ndị Spen gburu ihe dị ka Ndị Taínos 100,000.
question: Kedu ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ hụrụ mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama ozugbo ndị nyocha rutere, dịka akụkụ ahụ siri dị?
reasoning:
Ajụjụ ahụ jụrụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ hụrụ mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama ozugbo ndị nyocha rutere, dịka akụkụ ahụ siri dị. N'okwu ahụ dị na pasaji, a kwuru na n'ime afọ ole na ole n'eso mbịarute nke ndị na-eme nchọpụta si Europe, ọ bụ ndị Taínos ka e belatara ọnụ ọgụgụ ha nke ukwuu. A kpọkwara ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Taínos ndị a gburu, bụ ihe dị ka 100,000 n'etiti afọ 1492 na 1498.

N'ịkọwapụta ndị mmadụ ndị hụrụ mgbanwe a (nke a bụ ndị Taínos), pasaji kpughere nke ọma na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Taínos nke gburu na nzaghachi n'ịbụ ndị mmeri ndị Spain. N’ihi ya, azịza ziri ezi bụ nke metụtara «Ndị Tono» (bụ́ ndị a kpọrọ ná pasaji dịka ndị Taínos).

Ụzọ ndị ọzọ e nyere adịghị nke ọma zaa ajụjụ a:
- «Ndị Haiti» adịghị akwado maka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ hụrụ mgbanwe ozugbo ndị nyocha rutere.
- «Nke Caribbean» bụ kpọmkwem mba ma ọ bụghị onye mmadụ.
- «Ọ bụ Spanish» metụtara ndị mmeri, ọ bụghị ndị hụrụ mgbanwe ahụ dị ịrịba ama.

Yabụ, naanị ihe pasaji kpọmkwem kwuru gbasara mgbanwe ndị mmadụ hụrụ bụ banyere ndị Taínos.

passage: Enwere ọtụtụ akụkọ maka etu e si mepụta asụsụ Sanskrit. Otu n'ime ha bụ na o si n'aka ndị Aryan jiiri asụsụ ha si n'ọdịda anyanwụ bata India. Sanskrit bụ asụsụ mgbe gboo bụrụkwa nke enwere ike ịtụnyere asụsụ Latịn a na asụ na Yuropu. Akwụkwọ mbụ a maara n'ụwa a bụ asụsụ Sanskrit ka e ji dee ya. Mgbe a chịkọtachara Upanishads, asụsụ ndị ọzọ ewere ọnọdụ sanskrit. Sanskrit bụ asụsụ bara ụba ma dị mgbagwoju anya, nke bụ isi mmalite ọtụtụ asụsụ obodo India taa, dịka Latịn siri bụrụ isi mmalite asụsụ mba Iroopu dịka Frenchị na Spaniishi.
question: Olee asụsụ Sanskrit metụtara dika esi dee n’akwụkwọ a?
reasoning: Ihe edere n'akwụkwọ na-ekwu na Sanskrit bụ asụsụ mgbe gboo, a tụnyere ya na asụsụ Latin nke e ji atụnyere asụsụ Europe. A na-akọwa Sanskrit dị ka asụsụ ndị Aryan bịara na India na asụsụ a dị mgbagwoju anya nke bụ isi mmalite nke ọtụtụ asụsụ obodo India. Nke a gosiri na a na-ewere Sanskrit dịka asụsụ oge ochie ma bụrụkwa asụsụ a na-eji akwụkwọ dee nke mbụ n'ụwa. N'ikwu ya n'ụzọ ọzọ, a na-ahụ Sanskrit dị ka "asụsụ oge ochie" n'ihe banyere usoro oge na etu esi ede ya n’akwụkwọ. Nketa aha ndị ọzọ nke asụsụ ndị e nyere anaghị egosipụta nke a kpọmkwem dịka nke a na-ekwu ozugbo n'akwụkwọ ahụ. Ya mere, azịza kachasị doo anya bụ [3] «Asụsụ oge ochie».

passage: Ya na ngbanwe site n'ịgba ọsọ nkeji iri na ise ruo ọkara maịlị, mkpa èkwòmọsọ adịzie nnọọ obere ma ntachi obi na-abụ ihe dị oke mkpa. Otu okwesiri onye oka-ibe na igba okara-maili, otu nwoke bu onue nwere ike imeri nkeji abuo, ga enweriri oke osiso di nma, mana nnagide ka aga azuriri nime ihe mmeru-ahu obula. Ụfọdụ ịgba ọsọ n’ofe mba n’oge oyi, ejikọtara ya na ọrụ mgbatị ahụ maka akụkụ ahụ nke elu, bụ njikere kachasị mma maka oge agbamọsọ ahụ.
question: Ịsonyere mpaghara akwụkwọ a, olee otu n’ime ihe ndi a dịkasiri mkpa maka ọgbaọsọ maịlị-ọkara klasị-iziz?
answer_list: Ịmụ ịgbaọsọ ngafe obodo n’oge ọnwa winta
Ịnwe mmasị ịnwe nnagide tinyekwuru ikeọsọ
Ịnwe mmasị inweta ike ọsọ karịa nnagịde
reasoning: Akwụkwọ ahụ kwuru na ọtụtụ ihe dị mkpa maka ọgbaọsọ maịlị-ọkara klasị-iziz gụnyere nnagide na ntachi obi, karịsịa mgbe ọnọdụ na-agbanwe site n'ịgba ọsọ nkeji iri na ise ruo ọkara maịlị. O kwesịrị ka onye ahụ enwerịrị oke osiso dị mma, ma nnagide bụ nke kachasị mkpa maka ime nke ọma n'ọgbaọsọ ahụ. Nke a na-egosi na ịnwe nnagide tinyere ikeọsọ bụ ihe kacha mkpa, karịa naanị ịmecha ọsọ ngwa ngwa ma ọ bụ naanị inwe ike ọsọ karịa nnagide. Ihe ndabere nke igbo okwu ahụ bụ "Otu okwesiri onye oka-ibe na igba okara-maili, otu nwoke bu onue nwere ike imeri nkeji abuo, ga enweriri oke osiso di nma, mana nnagide ka aga azuriri nime ihe mmeru-ahu obula." Nke a na-egosi na nnagide na ntachi obi bụ ihe kachasị mkpa, nke kwekọrọ na nhọrọ 2.

passage: N'ime mmadụ otu puku na iri anọ tụrụ ụtụ tupu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gọọmenti etiti nke afọ 2010, ndị megidere mba Ọstrelia ịbụ obodo kwuuru onwe ya ji pasentị asatọ rịa elu kemgbe afọ 2008. Onye nlekota ala (Caretaker Prime Minister) Julia Gillard kwuru n’oge Kampeenu nke nhoputa ndi ochichi nke goomenti etiti na okwere na Australia kwesiri ibu repoblik ma Eze nwanyi Elizabeth nke abuo chicha. 34 nime-otu-nari-nile bu ndi tinyere aka na ntuli aka ahu n’enwe otu uche ahu, n’acho ka Eze-nwanyi Elizabeth II buru onye eze nke ikpeazu nke Australia. Ka ịtụ vootu nọ na ngwụcha, pasentị iri abụọ na itolu n'ime ndị elebaara anya kwenyere na Ọstrelia kwesịrị ịbụrụ mba nọọrọ onwe ya ngwa ngwa, ebe pasentị iri atọ na otu kwenyere na Ọstrelia ekwesịghị ịbụ obodo nọọrọ onwe ya.
question: Kedu mgbe Australia ga-ekwupụta na ya bụ mba, ka Julie Gillard siri kwuo?

passage: "MRI dabeere na Nuklia Magnetik Rezonans (NMR) na fiziks, nke Felix Bloch (na-arụ ọrụ na Mahadum Stanford) na Edward Purcell (si na Mahadum Havad) chọpụtara n'afọ 1930 ga. Na rezọnansị a, fild ndọta na ifufe redio na-akpata ụmụ atọm inyefụ ụmụ ntakịrị mgbaama redio. N'afọ 1970, Remond Damadian, bụ dibia bekee na onye nchọpụta ihe sayensị, chọpụtara ntọala iji osise foto magnetik rezonans mere ngwa ọrụ dibia bekee eji enyocha ahụ. Afọ anọ gachara e nyere otu patentị, nke bụ patentị mbụ n’ụwa enyere na fịịldị nke MRI. N'afọ 1977, Dkt. Damadian rụchara igwe nnyocha MRI ""nke ahụ niile"", nke ọ kpọrọ ""Indọmitebul""."
question: Onye chọpụtara rezọnansi magnetiki?
reasoning:
The passage states that "MRI dabeere na Nuklia Magnetik Rezonans (NMR) na fiziks, nke Felix Bloch (na-arụ ọrụ na Mahadum Stanford) na Edward Purcell (si na Mahadum Havad) chọpụtara n'afọ 1930 ga." This clearly indicates that the Magnetic Resonance phenomenon was discovered by Felix Bloch and Edward Purcell. While Remond Damadian made significant advances in the application of MRI for medical imaging and completed the MRI machine, the discovery of the fundamental resonance phenomenon is attributed explicitly to Bloch and Purcell.

Therefore, the correct answer is the option that names both Bloch and Purcell as the discoverers of magnetic resonance.

question: Isonye na mpaghara edemede a, olee ihe n'ime ndị a kọwara kpomkwem omume ọjọọ nke ụmụaka?

These two conditions are clearly indicated as the triggers of the conflict. On the other hand, "Kọmunizim" is the system against which the protest was directed, not the cause of the unrest itself. Additionally, the passage mentions Wladyslaw Gomulka being placed in power as a response or outcome, not as a cause of the unrest. Hence, the correct options that directly caused the unrest are "Ụkọ nri" and "Mbelata ụgwọ ọrụ". Since the question asks for what caused the unrest, option 2 ("Ụkọ nri") and option 3 ("Mbelata ụgwọ ọrụ") are both valid. In a multiple-choice format where only one answer can be selected, the best specific and direct cause listed in the passage is "Ụkọ nri" (food shortage), as the passage mentions workers protesting this first, leading to general unrest.

Option [4] about exerting more finger strength to get louder sound contradicts the passage, which states that loudness comes from airflow, not finger force.

Thus, the passage explicitly rejects the idea of using excessive finger strength for louder sound or unnecessary finger movements. Option [1] explicitly contradicts this by stating that one should increase finger strength to press the keys harder, which is exactly what the passage says is not necessary. N'ụzọ doro anya, anaghị akọwa na ihe ndị ọzọ dị na azịza ndị ọzọ dị ka aspọtụ maka ọnwa isii, akwụkwọ ozi ịkpọ òkù gọọmentị, ma ọ bụ tiketi nloghachi bụ ihe achọrọ kpọmkwem maka ndị Cubans n'okwu a, kama okwu e kwuru bụ banyere akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ (green card) si US, bụ nke ndị Cuba ga-enwerịrị inye tupu ha abanye Ecuador.

passage: Mgbe aruchara akwa-mmiri ahu na afo 1963, ewee kwusi udu idemiri ahu nke na agbasa unyi na ahu mmiri ahu nile. Sedimenti a dị mkpa maka ịmepụta ụmụ mgbochi ejiri aja mee ma akụkụ osimiri, nke jere ozi dị ka ebe obibi anụ ọhịa. N’ihi nke ahụ, ụdị azụ abụọ ekpochapụla, ma abụọ ndị ọzọ abụrụla ndị nọ n’ihe ize ndụ, gụnyere humpback chub. Agbanyeghi na larịị mmiri ahụ ga-eto elu ụkwụ ole na ole naanị mgbe idei mmiri ahụ gasịrị, ndị isi na-enwe olile anya na ọ ga-ezu iji weghachi ụmụ ugwu aja nke mmiri riri na ndịda ụzọ mmiri.
question: Kedu ihe ndị isi na-atụ anya ka iju mmiri ahụ mezuo?
answer_list: Mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ humpback chubs
reasoning:
N’ime passage a, e kwuru kpọmkwem na ndị isi nwere olile anya na iju mmiri ahụ ga-ezu "iji weghachi ụmụ ugwu aja nke mmiri riri na ndịda ụzọ mmiri." Nke a pụtara na ebumnuche bụ ịkwalite ma weghachi ọnụ ọgụgụ ma ọ bụ gburugburu ebe obibi nke ụmụ ugwu aja ndị a bụ́ ndị na-adị n’ụzọ mmiri ahụ. N'ụzọ doro anya, nke a metụtara "mgbọma nke ọnụ ọgụgụ humpback chubs," nke bụ otu ụdị azụ a kpọrọ aha na passage a dịka onye nọ n'ihe ize ndụ. Otu ahụ adịghị akọwa ibelata unyi ma ọ bụ ịrụzi aja, kama ọ na-elekwasị anya na ịkwalite ọnọdụ ndụ nke ụdị azụ ndị a, nke dabara nke ọma na nhọrọ nke atọ.

Akwụkwọ kọwara ihe mere sediment (aja aja) ji dị mkpa na ịmepụta ụmụ mgbochi ejiri aja mee, nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ebe obibi anụ ọhịa, ma nke a bụ ngwongwo nke iju mmiri na-emetụ anya, mana isi olile anya na iju mmiri ahụ bụ iji weghachite ụdị azụ ụfọdụ. Nke ahụ pụtara na nhọrọ nke anọ, ụlọ ọzọ maka anụ ọhịa, bụ eziokwu nke ukwuu mana ọ bụghị otu isi ihe ndị isi na-atụ anya ka iju mmiri ahụ mezuo dịka ọkpụkpọ ahịa.

N’ihi nke a, nhọrọ ziri ezi bụ nke na-achọ mgbasawanye n’ọnụ ọgụgụ nke humpback chubs, n’ihi na nke a bụ usoro nke ịweghachite ụdị azụ ndị ahụ nke e kwuru kpọmkwem na passage.

passage: N’adịghị ka praịmetị ndị ọzọ, hominids anaghịzi eji aka ha aga-ije ma ọ bụ ibu ihe ma ọ bụ ịwụgharị n’etiti ụmụ osisi. Aka na ukwu adaka ahụ yiri na nha na ogologo, na-egosi ojiji aka ya maka ibute ibu nọ n'ime ije njikọ mkpịsịaka. Aka mmadụ dị mkpụmkpụ karịa ụkwụ, ya na ụmụ ọkpụkpọ mkpịsị aka kara kwụ ọtụ. Ụmụ ọkpụkpọ aka fosil gbara afọ nde abuo rue nde ato na-ekpughe ngbanwe a na ọkachamara nke aka ahụ site na ngagharị rue mmegharị.
question: Gịnị n'ime ndị a edesitara kọwara n’ezie ọkpụkpụ mkpịsịaka na mkpụrụkwụ nke chimpanzee?
answer_list: Nha aka na ụkwụ ha abụghị otu
Ihe mbu eji ha eme bụ nrụgharị
reasoning:
Ihe a kwuru na passage bụ na aka na ukwu nke hominids dị ka nke mmadụ adịghị ka nke praịmetị ndị ọzọ (dị ka chimpanzees). E kwuru na aka na ukwu ha dị ka nha na ogologo, nke na-egosi na a na-eji aka eme njem ibute ibu n'oge ije. N’aka nke ọzọ, e kwuru na aka mmadụ dị mkpụmkpụ na mkpịsịaka ha dị kwụ ọtụ karịa nke chimpanzees. Nke a na-egosi na aka mmadụ gbanwere iji rụọ ọrụ nke ibute ibu mgbe ha na-aga, ọ bụghị naanị iji kpọnwụrụ ma ọ bụ mere ọrụ dị mfe. Ebee ka ọ na-ekwu maka chimpanzees? Passage nwere ike ịkọwa aka na ụkwụ nke chimpanzees bụ na ha abụghị otú nke hominids, na maka hominids aka ha nwere mkpịsị aka kwụ ọtụ, na ịdị mkpụmkpụ aka ha.

Ugbu a, ka anyi leba anya na azịza ndị e nyere:

[1] «Ha gbatịkarịrị nke ndị mmadị» - Nke a bụ eziokwu gbasara chimpanzees karịa hominids, na passage ekwuola na aka mmadụ dị mkpụmkpụ karịa.

[2] «Nha aka na ụkwụ ha abụghị otu» - Passage kwuru na aka na ukwu ha dị ka nha na ogologo, nke na-egosi nha ha yiri ibe ha, nke nke a agaghị adabara.

[3] «Eji ha anagide ibu» - Nke a bụ maka aka nke hominids, nke ahụ na-egosi na aka ha eji bu ibu mgbe ha na-aga ije, ma nke a apụtaghị kpọmkwem banyere chimpanzees.

[4] «Ihe mbu eji ha eme bụ nrụgharị» - Ebe a, passage na-ekwu ka "ngbanwe a na ọkachamara nke aka ahụ site na ngagharị rue mmegharị," nke na-egosi na aka ha (hominids) bụ igagharị, ikekwe gbasara mkpịsịaka ha, dị iche na chimpanzees.

N’ihi nke a, azịza kacha kwekọrọ na nke akọwara kpọmkwem njirimara aka na mkpịsịaka nke chimpanzees bụ nke [1] bụrụ na chimpanzees nwere mkpịsịaka gbatịrị karịa nke mmadụ (bụ hominids). N'okpuru passage, mmadụ nwere mkpịsịaka kwụ ọtụ, aka mkpụmkpụ, ebe "ọkpụkpọ mkpịsị aka kara kwụ ọtụ" yiri na nke chimpanzee agaghị adị otú ahụ, ọ bụkwa na ha nwere mkpịsịaka gbatịrị. Nke a pụtara na azịza [1] bụ nke zuru oke na onye na-ajụ ajụjụ banyere chimpanzee.

passage: Asụsụ karịrị puku ise dị n'ụwa, ma nwekwaa ihe karịrị iri abụọ nke ndị na-asụ ya nwere ike ịkarị nde iri ise. Edemede na-adịkwakarị mfe nghọta karịa okwu ekwuru ekwu. question: Ònye, n'iburu n'uche paragraf ahụ, o yikarịrị ka ọ ga-enwe ma ọ dịkarịa ala iwu bụ isi nke asụsụ Bekee?

reasoning:

passage: Ebe Sundarbans bụ ebe ala nwere ọhịa mmiri nọ n'akụkụ mmiri kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa dum, na-agbatị ruo kilomita 80 (50 mi) n'ime n'ala Bangladesh na India ahụ nke amaghị ama site n'ụsọ osimiri. E kwupụtawo na Sundarbans bụ otu Ebe Nketa Keụwa UNESCO. Akụkụ nke oke ọhịa n'ime ókèala nke Indịa ka a na-akpọ Obianụọhịa Kemba Sundarbans. Ọhịa ndị a abụghịkwa sọọsọ apịtị mangrov dị na ha – ha gụnyekwara ihe ndị ka fọrọ site n'oke ọhịa ndị juburu Ala nọ na mpaghara Ganjiz. Sundabans kpuchiri ohere km² 3850, nke mmiri maọbụ ala apịtị kpuchiri otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ ya. Ka mgbe 1966, ka Sundarbans ji buru ebe obibi nso anu ohia ana asi na aga enwe ihe dika 400 Royal Bengal tiger na ihe dika 30,000 mgbada nwere ntupo na mpaghara ebe ahu.
question: Kedu n'ime nkwupụta ndị a gbasara Sundarbans na-adakọghị na ozi dị na akụkụ ahụ?

Ahịhịa na-ekpuchi ọkara nke mkpokọta mpaghara ya
Akara mangrove kacha ibu n'ụwa niile
Enwere mgbada ahụrụ anya ebe ahụ karịa agụ Bengal

E kwukwara na Sundarbans kpuchiri mpaghara ihe dị ka kilomita 3850, na mpaghara mmiri na ala apịtị mejupụtara otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke mpaghara ahụ, nke pụtara na karịa otu ụzọ atọ nke mpaghara ahụ abụghị ahịhịa. Nke a pụtara na nhọrọ nke na-ekwu na ahịhịa na-ekpuchi ọkara nke mkpokọta mpaghara ya ( nhọrọ 2 ) adịghị adakọ na ozi n'ime akụkụ ahụ.

question: Kedu n'ime ederede ndị a na-akọwapụtaghị origami Purelandi ka ọdị?

Foldu ya ga-enwerịrị ebe amara amara

question: Ebee ka ụgbọmmiri na-aga mgbe ihe ahụ mere?
reasoning: The passage states: "Avenger class mine na emesho ugbommiri, ugbommiri ahu n’aga Puerto Princessa na Palawan." This clearly indicates that after the incident, the ship was heading to Puerto Princessa, which is located in Palawan. This is the direct and explicit location to which the ship was going after the event. The other options (Steeti America [United States], Puerto Rico, and Japan) are mentioned but not as the destination of the ship after the incident. Puerto Rico is similar in name but is not mentioned as the location in the passage; Japan is mentioned as the location of the US Navy fleet based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, and the USA is the country of the navy, but neither is the location to which the ship was traveling. Therefore, the correct answer is Palawan.

But the best supported answer explicitly from the passage is that these flat lands in Rogaland and Agder are called "hei" and they mean "flat land without trees." No option states this exactly.

Since option 4 mentions heather, and the passage says "Na mba Nọọwe, enwere mkpọda ugwu na ndịda ugwu na anọkata ghọrọ ala dị elu ma dị larịị. Ala ndị a dị larịị ka a na akpọ 'vidde' nke pụtara ebe dị obosara, ghee oghe..." unambiguously omits trees but does not mention heather.

Therefore, the answer best supported is that the flat lands are treeless; the passage uses the term "hei" to describe such lands in Rogaland and Agder.

Given the options, the one that aligns best with treelessness is option 1 if "Osisi dị" is understood as presence of trees — contradicting the passage.

Thus, the answer that uniquely identifies these lands compared to other Norwegian flat lands is they are "ihe dị larịị na enweghị osisi," meaning flat and treeless.

No option matches precisely, but the best fit is option 1 despite it meaning the opposite.

Since option 1 is "Osisi dị" (Trees present) which is opposite, the only option that does not explicitly contradict the passage or adds irrelevant information is option 3 "Ọtụtụ n'ime ala dị larịị bụ otu” which could be linked to the passage's "enwere mkpọda ugwu na ndịda ugwu" meaning in other areas they are all similar so "otu" (the same) might refer to the rest of Norway; it is not explicit, but it's the only meaning that doesn't conflict with the passage explicitly.

passage: N'Oktoba 6, 1789, ụmụ nwanyị ahịa iwe ji yiri Eze Luwi XVI oke egwu mgbe ha si na Versailles dọrọ ya, nwunye ya Marịa Antwanet, obere ụmụ ha abụọ (Marịa Teriza dị afọ 11 na Luwi-Chals dị afọ anọ), na nwanne nwanyị Eze, Madam Elizabet, dọghachi ha na Parii. Ha laghachiri Paris n'ime moto ịnyịnya ndị iwe na-ewe gbara gburugburu, ha na-eti mkpu na-agwa Eze na Nwunye ya ihe egwu dị iche iche. Ndị iwe a manyere Eze na Queen ka ha meghee windo ụgbọ ha. N'otu mgbe otu n'ime ndị igwe mmadụ fegharịrị isi onye nche eze egburu na Versailles n'ihu eze nwanyi ụjọ ji.

Therefore, the correct answer is option 4: "Onyenche" (chief of the guard).

question: Kedu otu Jizọs kwụrụ ụgwọ mmalite £27 nde?

The passage states: "Jesus di afo 21 sonyere Manchester City afo gara aga na Januari 2017 o si Klub Brazil ana akpo Palmeiras k’akuko siko akwuru nde £27." This means Jesus, aged 21, joined Manchester City in January 2017 from the Brazilian club named Palmeiras for a fee of £27 million. Therefore, the initial payment of £27 million was made by Manchester City to Palmeiras. The question asks "Kedu otu Jizọs kwụrụ ụgwọ mmalite £27 nde?" which translates to "Who did Jesus pay the initial £27 million fee to?" or more naturally "Who did Jesus's transaction of £27 million involve?" The answer is the club Palmeiras, as that is where the money was paid to, not the club Jesus joined.

None of the other clubs are mentioned in the passage connected to the fee payment. Manchester City is the club Jesus joined, Palmeiras is the club he left from and who received the £27 million, Cruzeiro and Manchester United are not mentioned in the passage at all.

Hence, the best answer, strictly based on the passage text, is option 1, Palmeiras.

question: Dị ka mpaghara akwụkwọ a sị kwu, kedu n'ime ihe ndị a edesịtara ka Triceratops nwekarịrị ike iri?
answer_list: Osisi nwere mkpụrụ osisi na-egbu egbu
reasoning: Akwụkwọ a kwuru na Traịseratọpsụ nwere ike iri "ma mpalaga osisi na mgbọrọgwụ ndị siri ezigbo ike" na okwu ahụ sịrị: "Eze traịserotọpsụ ga-enweli ike ịgbari ọ bụghị naanị akwụkwọ osisi mana ọbụlagodi mpalaga osisi na mgbọrọgwụ ndị siri ezigbo ike." N'ikwu ya ọzọ, Traịseratọpsụ nwere ike iri osisi nke nwere akụkụ siri ike dịka alaka na mgbọrọgwụ. Okwu "Osisi nwere alaka siri ike" na-eme ka ọ dabara nke ọma na nkọwa ahụ, ebe ọ bụkwa okwu ziri ezi nke ekwuputara. Ndị ọzọ, dịka "S ụlọtụ", "Parọtụ", na "Osisi nwere mkpụrụ osisi na-egbu egbu", enweghị nkwado doro anya na edemede. Ọ bụghịkwa na e kwuru na Traịseratọpsụ na-eri anụmanụ ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ osisi na-egbu egbu. Ya mere, nhọrọ kacha kwekọrọ na edemede bụ "Osisi nwere alaka siri ike."

passage: Bleedi nọ n'akpụkpọ ụkwụ aịz sketị nke ugbua nwere akụkụ abụọ nke oghere dabara ime dị n'etiti ha. Akụkụ abụọ a na-eme ka o jide aịz nke ọma karịa, ma mgbe o hulatara n'otu akụkụ. N'ihi na okpuru agụba ahụ rọrọ arọ nwa obere, ka agụba ahụ na-arọje n'otu akụkụ maọbụ nke ọzọ, akụkụ ahu nke na-emetụ mkpụrụ mmiri ga arọkwa. Nke a na-eme ka onye na-agba skeeti tụgharịa. Ọ bụrụ na skeeti atụlaga n'aka nri, onye na-agba ya atụlagakwa n'aka nri, ọ bụrụ na skeeti atụlaga n'aka ekpe, onye na-agba ya atụlagakwa n'aka ekpe.
question: Isonye ka esi dee n’akụkụ akwụkwọ a, olee ndesịta kọwapụtara kpọmkwem oghere dị n’ihu sketi izi ọgbara ọhụrụ?
reasoning: N'akwụkwọ ahụ, e kwuru maka akụkụ abụọ nke oghere dị n'etiti ha na a na-akpọ ha site n'iji okwu "Akụkụ abụọ a" nke na-egosi na oghere ahụ bụ "Ihu gbara abụọ." Okwu ndị ọzọ dị ka "ịhu rụgọrọ arụọ" na "ihu kọnkevu" adịghị kpọmkwem kọwaa oghe ahụ nke e kwuru banyere ya n'akụkụ akwụkwọ ahụ. N'okwu mbụ nke passage ahụ "Bleedi nọ n'akpụkpọ ụkwụ aịz sketị nke ugbua nwere akụkụ abụọ nke oghere dabara ime dị n'etiti ha," a na-akọwa oghe ahụ dị ka akụkụ abụọ na-eme oghere ahụ, nke kwekọrọ na "Ihu gbara abụọ." Ya mere, azịza kwesịrị ekwesị bụ nke na-egosi oghere dị n’ihu sketi nwere akụkụ abụọ.

passage: Ịntanetị na-ejikọ akụkụ nke nkwukọrịta ọha na nkwukọrịta nke mmadụ abụọ. Njirimara pụrụ iche nke Ịntaneetị na-eduga akụkụ agbakwụnyere n’usoro nke ojiji ya na usoro afọ ojuju. Maka ọmụmaatụ, “mmụta” na “mkpakọrịta” bụ ndị atụnyere dịka mkpalite dị mkpa maka ojiji Ịntanetị (James na ndị ọzọ., 1995). Eighmey na McCord(1998) chọpụtara na “nsonye” na “mmekọrịta ga-adịgịde” sokwa na ihe mkpali ọhụrụ mgbe ha nyochara mmeghachi omume ndị na-abịa n'ọtụtụ webụsaịtị.
question: Olee ihe na-egosipụtaghị mkpalite iji ịntanetị maka ntinye aka nkeonwe?
answer_list: Ịziga ozi n’ogwe mkpakọrita ụka n’intaneeti
reasoning:
Passage nwere nkọwa banyere ihe ndị na-akpali mmadụ iji jiri ịntanetị mee ihe n'echiche nke mpụga na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya. A kọwara na mmụta, mkpakọrịta, nsonye, na mmekọọrịta ga-adịgịde bụ ihe ndị na-akpali iji Ịntanetị na nke a bụ maka ntinye aka nkeonwe. 

Ajụjụ jụrụ gbasara ihe *na-egosighị* mkpalite iji ịntanetị maka ntinye aka nkeonwe, ya bụ, nke anaghị adabara n’ime ihe ndị a kọwara dị ka ihe na-akpali.

Ndị mkpụrụokwu nwere ihe metụtara mmasị ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ ndị dị ka: iziga ozi n’ogwe mkpakọrita ụka n’intaneeti (nke a bụ mkparịta ụka mmadụ na ibe ya), ọ bụkwa na mpaghara nke e kwuru banyere nsonye na mmekọọrịta. Nke a jikọtara ya na ntinye aka nkeonwe.

Ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka «Ị le anya n’usoro», «Ịme nchọpụta ngwaahịa njikwa ahụike», na «Ịlekwata ihe akụ na ụba» adịghị egosiputa njikọ doro anya na ntinye aka nkeonwe n’ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma ọ bụ mmụta nke e kwuru n’isiokwu ahụ.

Nke na-egosighị mkpalite iji ịntanetị maka ntinye aka nkeonwe bụ ngwaahịa na ọrụ ndị mmegharị nkeonwe na akọwara nkeghị na mpụga mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.

Nke kacha apụta bụ nhọrọ 1: «Ị le anya n’usoro» nke bụ ihe a na-eme na-adịkarịghị metụtara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye nkụzi, ma ọ bụ mmụta n'ịntanetị. O kwere omume na ọ bụ nanị iji nweta ozi, ọ bụghị maka ntinye aka nkeonwe.

Ya mere, nke kacha doo anya bụ ụdị ihe a na-eme na Ịntaneti nke na-adịghị akpali ntinye aka nkeonwe bụ «Ị le anya n’usoro».

passage: "Ebe Montevideo dị na ndịda Iquetọ, ọ bụ oge ọkọchị ebe ahụ mgbe oge oyi dị na Ebe ugwu Emisfee ma n'otu aka ahụ. Montevideo nọ n'ime ebe na-ekpọ ọkụ ma jụọkwa oyi; n'ime ụmụ ọnwa ọkọchị, okpomọkụ gafere +30°C bụ ihe nkịtị. Oge oyi nwere ike ịjụ ezigbo oyi n'aghụghọ: okpomọkụ na-ara ahụ tupu ya gaa n'okpuru ịghọ okwute mmiri, mana ikuku na oruru mmiri na-abịakọta ọnụ ime ka o nwee mmetụta kara jụọ oyi karịa ihe temometa kwuru. Enweghị ihe dị ka ""udu mmiri"" na ""ọkọchị"": ogo mmiri ozuzo na-anọkarị otu ebe ogologo afọ niile."
question: Edemede a na-atụ aro oge dị mma iji gaa Montevideo ma ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ịnọpụ na ikuku?
answer_list: Mgbe ihu igwe kpọrọ nkụ na Montevideo
Mgbe oge okpomọkụ na-arị elu na Northern Hemisphere
reasoning:
Edemede ahụ kọwara oge ọkọchị na Montevideo dị iche iche na Northern Hemisphere. Ọ kwuru na Montevideo dị na ndịda Iquetọ, mgbe Northern Hemisphere bụ n'oge oyi, Montevideo nọ n'oge ọkọchị. Nke a pụtara na oge dị mma iji gaa Montevideo maka ihu igwe na-ekpo ọkụ na enweghị nnukwu ikuku oyi bụ "n'oge okpomọkụ na-arị elu na Northern Hemisphere" nke bụ oge ọkọchị na Northern Hemisphere, na Montevideo bụ oge ọkọchị. Ihe ọzọ, edemede ahụ na-ekwu na enweghi ọdịiche mmiri ozuzo distinct dị ka "ọgwụgwụ mmiri mmiri" ma ọ bụ "ọkụkwọchị," kama mmiri ozuzo nọ otu mgbe niile, ọ pụtara na ihe kacha mkpa bụ okpomọkụ. N'ihi ya, nhọrọ kacha mma bụ "Mgbe oge okpomọkụ na-arị elu na Northern Hemisphere" n’ihi na nke a bụ oge Montevideo ga-enwe okpomọkụ dị elu na ihu igwe dị mma maka ndị chọrọ ịnọpụ n’ụdị ikuku oyi.

Ejighị edemede ahụ kwuo ihe banyere ịga Montevideo n'oge oyi ya onwe ya ma ọ bụ kpọrọ nkụ ebe ahụ, ma ọ bụ n'oge oyi nke Northern Hemisphere dị ka oge kwesịrị ekwesị iji gara nke ọma. Ozi ahụ pụtara doro anya na Montevideo dị otutu oyi n'oge oyi ya ma na-ekpo ọkụ n'oge ọkọchị. Yabụ, "N'oge oyi na Montevideo" ma ọ bụ "N'oge oyi nke Northern Hemisphere" anaghị adị mma. Ọzọkwa, "Mgbe ihu igwe kpọrọ nkụ na Montevideo" adịghị edo anya ma kwere nghọta na edemede kwuru na mmiri ozuzo nọ otu mgbe niile, yabụ, nke a anaghị akọwa ọdịdaMontevideo kachasị mma.

Ya mere, azịza kacha kwekọrọ na edemede bụ nke atọ.

passage: A mụrụ n’isi obodo Kroeshịa, Zagreb, Bobek nwetara ọmụma mgbe ọ na-agbara Partizan Belgradi. O sonyere ha na 1945 ma nọrọ ruo 1958. Na oge ya na ndi otu egu ahu, osuiri okpo goolu 403 na mputa 468. O nwebeghị onye ọzọ ọbụla na-agbakarịala bọọlụ maọbụ nyekarịa goolụ n'otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ahụ karịa Bobek. question: Kedu n'ime okwu ndị a gbasara oge Bobek na Partizan Belgrade bụ nke na-abụghị eziokwu?
answer_list: Mgbe ọ bụ onye otu, ọ kpakọbara ihe karịrị 468 mgbaru ọsọ
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye gbara ọtụtụ goolu
A họpụtara ya otu oge ka ọ bụrụ onye ọkaibe n'otu egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye ọkpụkpọ kacha pụta ìhè n'egwuregwu
reasoning: Ihe odide kwuru na Bobek sonyere Partizan Belgrade site na 1945 ruo 1958. Ọ zụrụ okpo goolu 403 na mputa 468, ya bụ, ọ kpakọbara goolu 403 nke mere ka ọnụọgụ ahụ dị na mputa buru ibu karịa osuiri okpo goolu. O nwebeghị onye ọzọ agbakarala bọọlụ maọbụ nyere goolụ karịrị ya. N'afọ 1995, a tụrụ ya onye kacha pụta ìhè n'akụkọ Patizan. N'ịbụ nke a, okwu na-ekwu na "Mgbe ọ bụ onye otu, ọ kpakọbara ihe karịrị 468 mgbaru ọsọ" adịghị eziokwu n'ihi na 468 mputa bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mere goolu, ọ bụghị goolu ndị o kpakọbara. Ihe a na-akọwa bụ goolu 403 ya mere ọ bụghị eziokwu na o kpakọbara karịa 468 goolu. Ihe ndị ọzọ niile dị ka "Ọ bụ ya bụ onye gbara ọtụtụ goolu," "A họpụtara ya otu oge ka ọ bụrụ onye ọkaibe n'otu egwuregwu," na "Ọ bụ onye ọkpụkpọ kacha pụta ìhè n'egwuregwu" kwekọrọ nke ọma na ntụaka dị na akwụkwọ.

passage: Pọpụleshọn bụ nchịkọta ihe nwere otu ụdị n'ebe ọbụla ekepụtara. Mgbe mmadụ nile n'otu ọnụ ọgụgụ nwere otu ihe metụtara otu omume phenotypic ahụ, a maara ha dịka monomorphic. Mgbe ndị mmadụ na-egosi ọtụtụ ụdị nke otu agwa kpọmkwem ha bụ polimọfik.
question: Kedu n'ime ihe ndị a bụ okwu ziri ezi maka ihe ndị dị ndụ nọ n’otu mpaghara?
reasoning: N'okwu nke passage kwuru, "Pọpụleshọn bụ nchịkọta ihe nwere otu ụdị n'ebe ọbụla ekepụtara." Nke a pụtara nke ọma na “Pọpụleshọn” bụ okwu ziri ezi maka "ihe ndị dị ndụ nọ n’otu mpaghara." Azịza nke atọ, "Ụdị ihe gasị," ezughi oke ma ọ bụ ghara ịbụ okwu a kpọtụrụ na passage, nke abụọ "Ngụpụta ndị mmadụ" na-apụtachaghị ihe doro anya dịka okwu a na-achọ. Azịza nke anọ "Nzịpụta nwere ọtụtụ ụdị" bụ nkọwa maka ụdị polimọfik, mana ajụjụ chọrọ okwu ziri ezi maka ihe ndị dị ndụ n’otu mpaghara n'ozuzu ya, nke bụ "Pọpụleshọn" dị ka nke mbụ si kwuo na passage. N'ihi ya, azịza ziri ezi bụ nke mbụ: "Nzịpụta nwere otu ụdị," nke kwekọrọ nke ọma na nkọwa nke "Pọpụleshọn" nke passage nyere.

passage: Ndị ọka mmụta sayensị achọpụtala ihe dịka ala nke gbasara n'ihu onwa nke akpọrọ lobet skaps nke nwere ike ịbụ ihe sitere n'ọnwa ịchịkọta nwayọ nwayọ. Skap ndị a ka achọpụtara gburugburu ọnwa ha dịkwa ka ihe ribatụrụ eriba, nke na-egosi na ihe mmegharị ala kpatara ya eteghị aka omere. Atụtụ a na-emegide atụmatụ na-akọwa na o nweghi  ihe mmegharị ala nke n'eme n'ọnwa.
question: Kedu n'ime okwu ndị na-esonụ gbasara scarps lobate bụ nke na-abụghị eziokwu, dịka akụkụ ahụ siri dị?
answer_list: O yikarịrị ka ha sitere na ihe ndị mere na mbụ
Ha gosipụtara na ọrụ geologic dị na ọnwa
Ha nwere ike pụta n'ihi na ọnwa na-adị ntakịrị
N'elu ọnwa, ọ bụghị ọtụtụ n'ime ha
reasoning:
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, a kọwara na lobate scarps bụ ihe ndị ọka mmụta sayensị chọpụtara n'ụwa ọnwa ma na ọ bụ ihe sitere na ala nke na-agbanwe nwayọ nwayọ ("ihe sitere n'ọnwa ịchịkọta nwayọ nwayọ"). A kọkwara na scarps ndị a dị gburugburu ọnwa ahụ ma dị ka ribatụrụ, nke pụtara na ha bụ nsonaazụ mmịgharị ala nke na-emeghị ka e mepụta mgbaji ma ọ bụ mebie ihe ("ihe mmegharị ala kpatara ya eteghị aka omere"). Nke a kwụsịrị echiche gara aga nke na ọnwa enweghị mmegharị ala.

Ndị a pụtara na:

- Nhọrọ 1: "O yikarịrị ka ha sitere na ihe ndị mere na mbụ" — nke a dabara adaba n'ihi na scarps bụ nsonaazụ mmegharị ala nke ọhụrụ, ọ bụghị ihe "mere na mbụ" n'ụzọ siri ike.
- Nhọrọ 2: "Ha gosipụtara na ọrụ geologic dị na ọnwa" — nke a bụ eziokwu doro anya.
- Nhọrọ 3: "Ha nwere ike pụta n'ihi na ọnwa na-adị ntakịrị" — nke a nwekwara ike ịbụ eziokwu n'ihi na mmegharị ala kpatara mkpụmkpụ nke ọnwa.
- Nhọrọ 4: "N'elu ọnwa, ọ bụghị ọtụtụ n'ime ha" — a naghị ekwu nke a n'akwụkwọ ahụ, na ọ bụ nkwupụta zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-abụghị eziokwu, n'ihi na a sịrị na a chọpụtara scarps n'agbata ọnwa niile.

Ọ bụkwa àgwà nke a na-ebu amụma oke ọnụ ọgụgụ nke scarps na ọnwa ka ọ bụghị nke dị ntakịrị. Ya mere, nhọrọ nke abụghị eziokwu bụ Nhọrọ 4.

passage: "N'ọtụtụ ebe n'ụwa, ife aka bụ emereme nnabata, nke na-egosipụta ""ndeewo."" N'otu aka ahụ, onye ome njem Britenụ nọ na Spenụ nwere ike ịghọtaghie ofufe aka ""ka ọdị"" nke ihu aka chere onye na-efe ya ihu (kama onye a na-efere aka) ka ọ na-asị ya lọghachi."
question: "Kedu ihe mmegharị ahụ na-egosi ""gafere"" n'ime ime obodo Malaysia?"
answer_list: na-eji mkpịsị aka aka iji tụgharịa
reasoning: Passage ahụ kwuru na na mba Malaysia, ife aka bụ "emereme nnabata" nke pụtara "bịa," nke pụtara ịkpọ onye ahụ ka ọ bịa. Kpọmkwem, okwu a bụ "n'etiti ndị Males, ọ pụtara 'bịa' dịka mgbe rọgharịrị mkpụrụ aka nke izi ịtụ onwe aka." Nke a putara na "gafere" ma ọ bụ mmegharị ahụ bụ nke na-egosi ịkpọ onye ka ọ bịa ma ọ bụ ịtụ aka na-eme ka onye ọzọ lọta. N'ụzọ doro anya, nke a dabara na nhọrọ [1] "na-eji mkpịsị aka aka iji tụgharịa," nke bụ ihe a na-eme ka onye ahụ bịa nso ma ọ bụ gafere. Ụbọchị ndị ọzọ dị ka "ịfefe" (shaking hands) ma ọ bụ "Elu-fiving" abụghị ihe a kọwaara dịka mmegharị "gafere" na passage ahụ. Ọkpụkpọ nke ife aka dị na Malaysia abụghị naanị ịfefe ma ọ bụ nkwanyere, kama ọ bụ iji mkpịsị aka tụgharịa onye ọzọ ka ọ bịa. Ya mere, nke kacha kwekọrọ na mmegharị a bụ "na-eji mkpịsị aka aka iji tụgharịa."

passage: Na narị afọ iri na asatọ, Kambodia hụtara onwe ya n'etiti agbatobi abụọ dị ike, Taịland na Vietnam. Ndị Taị lusoro Kambodịa agha ọtụtụ mgbe n’ime narị afọ nke iri na asatọ ma n’ime 1772 ha bibiri Phnom Phen. Na ngwụcha afọ ndị dị na senchuri nke iri na asatọ, ndị Vietnam wakpokwara Kambodia.
question: Olee ederede n'ime ndị a kọwapụtara kpọmkwem mwakpọ nke Cambodia?
answer_list: Ọtụtụ oge ka ndị Vietnam wakporo Cambodia
Ndị Thais na Vietnamese wakporo Cambodia n’afọ 1772

Nke a zitere ozugbo ajụjụ banyere mwakpọ nke Cambodia, na okwu a ziri ezi bụ nke na-ekwu banyere mwakpọ sitere na ndị Vietnam. Ọzọkwa, ahịrịokwu ahụ “Na ngwụcha afọ ndị dị na senchuri nke iri na asatọ, ndị Vietnam wakpokwara Kambodia.” bụ nkọwa kpọmkwem banyere mwakpọ nke Cambodia dị na passage ahụ. 

Nke mbụ, nhọrọ [1] bụ “Ọtụtụ oge ka ndị Vietnam wakporo Cambodia” nke kwekọrọ na nkọwa ahụ kpọmkwem. 
Nke abụọ, nhọrọ [2] “Ndị Thais na Vietnamese wakporo Cambodia n’afọ 1772” adịghị, n’ihi na na passage ekwughị na ndị Vietnamese wakporo n’afọ 1772; ọ sịrị otú ahụ naanị banyere Taịland nọ n’afọ 1772. 
Nke atọ [3] “Ndị Vietnamese mebiri Phnom Penh” adịghị ziri ezi n’ihi na na passage ekwughị na ndị Vietnamese mere nke ahụ, kama ndị Taịland mere nke ahụ na 1772. 
Nke anọ [4] “Ọtụtụ oge ka ndị Thai wakporo Cambodia” bụ eziokwu n’ime passage, mana ajụjụ siri na ajụjụ kwuru kpọmkwem mwakpọ nke Cambodia, n'ịhụ na e debere ahịrịokwu banyere Vietnam, mkpokọta nke Vietnam dị mkpa.

Ya mere, azịza kachasị mma nke kpọmkwem gosiri mwakpọ nke Cambodia bụ [1].

passage: Drukgyal Dzong bụ ebe ewusiri ike ebibiri ebibi bụrụkwa ebe obibi ndị mọnk n'efe Buda n'akụkụ elu nke distrikti Paro (n'ime obere obodo Fondi). A sị na n'afọ 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel rụrụ ebe mgbaba a iji cheta mmeri ya megide ndị agha Tibetan-Mongol. N'afọ 1951, ọkụ ọgbụgba mere ka sọ ihe onwunwe ole m'ole nke Drukgyal Dzong fọ, ihe dị ka onyonyo Zabdrung Ngawang Namgial. Mgbe ọkụ ahụ rechara, echekwara ma chedo ebe ahụ ewusiri ike, nke fọrọ ịbụ otu n’ime ihe ndọta kachasị emetụta nke Bhutan.
question: Olee edemede maka Drukgyal Dzong na-abụghị eziokwu?
answer_list: A rụrụ ya maka emume mmeri nke ndị agha Tibet-Mongol
Ọkụ bibiri ọtụtụ ihe dị mkpa fọdụrụnụ
Ọ bụ Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel kere ya
reasoning:
N'ime edemede, ekwupụtara na Drukgyal Dzong bụ ebe ewusiri ike ebibiri ebibi na ebe mọnk na-efe Buda nọ, dị n'akụkụ elu nke distrikti Paro. A kọwara na Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel wuru Drukgyal Dzong na 1649 iji cheta mmeri ya megide ndị agha Tibetan-Mongol. Otu akụkụ nke edemede na-ekwu na ọkụ gasịrị n'afọ 1951 wee bibie ọtụtụ ihe dị mkpa, gụnyere onyonyo Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel. Edemede ahụ akọwaghị na o wu ụzọ Bhutan, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ na mpaghara Bhutan ka ezuru ụlọ ahụ.

Nwee nyocha nke ajụjụ a bụ: "Olee edemede maka Drukgyal Dzong na-abụghị eziokwu?" Anyị kwesịrị ịchọta nke nyere ozi adịghị mma ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị eziokwu kpamkpam dịka edemede si kwuo.

Nke 1 ("A rụrụ ya maka emume mmeri nke ndị agha Tibet-Mongol") bụ eziokwu n'ihi na edemede kwuru na Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel rụrụ ya iji cheta mmeri ya megide ndị agha Tibetan-Mongol.

Nke 3 ("Ọkụ bibiri ọtụtụ ihe dị mkpa fọdụrụnụ") nwekwara nkwado n'ime edemede, nke kwuru na ọkụ mere ka ihe onwunwe ole na ole fọdụrụnụ.

Nke 4 ("Ọ bụ Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel kere ya") dabara nke ọma, edemede kwuru kpọmkwem na Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel wuru Drukgyal Dzong.

Kwụpụwa ebe 2 ("E hibere ya Bhutan") bụ okwu na-adịghị doo anya ma dịkwa iche na edemede. Edemede ekwughị na a hiwere Bhutan ebe a ma ọ bụ na Drukgyal Dzong bụ onye wuru Bhutan. Ọ bụ ezie na Drukgyal Dzong dị n'ógbè Bhutan ugbu a, edemede adịghị enye ozi ọ bụla na amasiri na ụlọ ahụ bụ iheដែល "e hiwere" (dị ka e guzoro ma ọ bụ kwụsịrị) Bhutan. Ya mere, nke a anaghị adabere nke ọma na edemede.

N'ihi ya, azịza nke na-abụghị eziokwu bụ nhọrọ 2.

question: Kedu onye ga-anata akwụkwọ mkpesa nke ndị ngagharị iwe ga-eweta?
reasoning:
The passage states that the initial law was proposed by the former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy, and the law is currently in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. It further mentions that the protestors hope to submit a petition with 1.2 million signatures to the national legislative assembly ("Nzuko Omeiwu Nke Mba Brazịl") in November. "Nzuko Omeiwu Nke Mba Brazịl" translates to "National Assembly of Brazil," which is the legislative body that lawmakers belong to and is the correct entity to receive such petitions.

The question is who will receive the protestors' petition. According to the passage, it will be submitted to the National Assembly of Brazil.

Option 1, "Ụka Katọlik" (Roman Catholic Church), is mentioned as opposing the law but not as the recipient of the petition.  
Option 2, Roberto Jefferson, currently holds the law but is not indicated as the recipient of the petition.  
Option 3, National Assembly of Brazil, matches "Nzuko Omeiwu Nke Mba Brazịl," which is clearly the entity receiving the petition.  
Option 4, "Onye isi ala So Paulo" (Mayor of São Paulo), was the original proposer but is not the recipient of the petition.

Therefore, the correct answer is option 3.

Michael Schumacher kwụsịrị ọsọ ya n’oge na-etoghị anya mgbe Alonso mesịrị, n’ihi mmebi sọspenshọn n’ime ọtụtụ agha n’ime oge ọsọ ahụ.
question: Kedu mgbe Alonso gbachara ọsọ ya?

O kwukwara na o nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi ụkwụ ihu ụgbọala a na-etinyeghi nke ọma. Nke a pụtara na Alonso kwụsịrị ọsọ ya ozugbo mgbe nsogbu ụkwụ ihu ụgbọala kpatara ya. N'ahịrị nke a, nkwụsị Alonso na-adị n’ime oge egwuregwu ahụ ozugbo mgbe ihe na-adịghị mma mere na ụgbọala ya.

Otu nhọrọ ziri ezi ga-abụ nke na-egosi na Alonso kwụsịrị ọsọ ya ozugbo mgbe nsogbu a mere, nke pụtara nhọrọ 1: «Ozugbo na-esochi mmebi wheel n'ihu Schumacher». Nhọrọ ndị ọzọ anaghị akọwa oge nke Alonso kwụsịrị ọsọ ya n'ụzọ kwụsiri ike ma ọ bụ na-ezighị ezi (egwuregwu ahụ bụ nke Alonso kwụsịrị, ọ bụghị Fisichella nke nyere aka, ya bụ roghọrọ 2, Schumacher kwụsịrị mgbe enwere mmebi ya, nke bụ oge nke ọzọ, na 3 na 4 adịghị metụtara nke ọma).

Nke a na-eme ka nhọrọ 1 bụrụ nke kacha kwalite azịza nke ajụjụ.

question: Kedu ihe na-esiri ndị njem na-enwe ujo nbanye ọzọ?

question: Dị ka esi dee n’akụkụ akwụkwọ a, gịnị welatara iji Sanskrit arụ ọrụ?

passage: A ga-edote akwụkwọ nkwado n'ọdịnihu. Ị ga-enwerịrị akwụkwọ nkwado ma ọbụrụ na ị ga-anọfe abali na Sirena. Sirena bụ sọ ụlọ nchekwa ọhịa na-enye ndị njem ebe ọnụnọ ma nri. La Leona, San Pedrilo, na Lọs Patos na-enye sọ ebe ọnụnọ n'enweghị nri. A ga-enwetali ikike idọsa moto n'aka Renja Steshọn na Puerto Jimenez, mana ị gaghị ejili kredit kad akwụ ha ụgwọ. Ụlọọrụ na-elekọta ogige ahụ (MINAE) anaghị enye ikike mbata n'ogige ahụ karia otu ọnwa tupu ịbata. question: Ebee ka ọkụ abụọ ahụ na-atụ aka?

Nke a zara ajụjụ "Ebee ka ọkụ abụọ ahụ na-atụ aka?" ozugbo mgbe ekwusịrị na a dochiri ụzọ abụọ dị ọkụ iji rụtụrụ mbara igwe n'otu abalị. Ọ pụtara na ọkụ abụọ ahụ jikọtara ụzọ abụọ nke e ji rụtụrụ mbara igwe, ọ bụghị ebe ndị ọzọ dị ka nsọtụ obodo ma ọ bụ ogige ncheta.

[4] «N'ime ogige ncheta, n'etiti» - a kwuru banyere ogige ncheta na edemede, mana ọ bụghị na ha bụ ebe ọkụ dị.

Ya mere, nhọrọ ziri ezi bụ nke na-ekwupụta na ọkụ abụọ ahụ bụ ụzọ abụọ dị ọkụ e dochiri iji rụtụrụ mbara igwe, ya bụ "ụzọ abụọ dị ọkụ." Nke a yiri ka ọ bụ nhọrọ [2] «Site na nsọtụ obodo» ma e jiri tụnyere ụzọ abụọ dị ọkụ abụghị nke a. Nke a pụtara na ọkụ ndị ahụ dị na ụzọ abụọ ahụ, ma edemede ekwughị na ha bi na nsọtụ obodo. Otú ọ dị, ugbu a, m ga-ahapụ nhọrọ ndị ọzọ:

[1] «Na-arịgo elu» - anaghị ekwu nke a.

question: Kedu n'ime nkwupụta ndị a gbasara moose na-akwadoghị?
answer_list: Ha bụ ndị e kere eke na-emegide ibe ha
Mgbe ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ anaghị ahụ ha dị ka ihe iyi egwu nwere ike ime
Onye ọ bụla nọ nso nwere ike ịtọlite ha
Ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa, ha ga-echebe onwe ha
reasoning:
Ụkwụ mbụ, anyị ga-enwe nghọta zuru oke gbasara okwu a jụụ banyere moose. O kwuputara na moose enweghị mburu pụta ụwa ịgha eze (ya bụ, ha anaghị ahụ anya ịlụ asọmpi ma ọ bụ ịgha eze), ma ọ ga-echekwa onwe ya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ hụ ihe ize ndụ. Ọzọkwa, e kwuru na mgbe ndị mmadụ anaghị ahụ ha dị ka ihe ize ndụ, ha nwere ike ịbịaru nso karịa ókè kwesịrị ekwesị, nke nwere ike ịkpata nsogbu.

Ugbu a ka anyi leba anya na nkọwa nke nhọrọ azịza:

[1] «Ha bụ ndị e kere eke na-emegide ibe ha» – Nke a pụtara na moose bụ ndị na-alụ asọmpi ma ọ bụ na-emegide ibe ha, nke bụ ihe megidere ozi nke passage kwuru na moose enweghị mburu pụta ụwa ịgha eze.

[2] «Mgbe ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ anaghị ahụ ha dị ka ihe iyi egwu nwere ike ime» – Nke a kwekọrọ na passage kwuru doro anya na mgbe mmadụ ahụghị moose dị ka ihe ize ndụ, ha nwere ike ịbịarute nso.

[3] «Onye ọ bụla nọ nso nwere ike ịtọlite ha» – Nke a adịghị akọwa ozugbo na passage, ọ nwechaghị ezi nkwenye na nke a bụ eziokwu.

[4] «Ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa, ha ga-echebe onwe ha» – Nke a kwekọrọ na passage nke na-ekwu moose ga-echekwa onwe ha ma ọ bụrụ na ha hụ ihe ize ndụ.

N'ihi nke a, nkwupụta nke na-akwadoghị bụ nke mbụ, nke kwuru na ha bụ ndị e kere eke na-emegide ibe ha, nke bụ ihe megidere ozi doro anya passage nyere.

question: Dịka paseeji ahụ kwuru, kedụ otu n’ime ndị a ga-abụ ọkachamara akwadoro maka ụmụnwanyị na-eme njem na ogige ahụ?

question: Kedụ ụdị anụ ndọgbụ na-erikarị oke bekee?

Therefore, the type of cats that mostly eat leopards is the large cats.

The other options do not fit:

- Option 3 «Ndị ọkara nha nwamba» means "medium-sized cats," which eat half carnivorous diet but the passage doesn't specifically link them to leopards.  
- Option 4 «Antelopu gasị» is unrelated to cats and not mentioned in the passage.

Hence, the passage explicitly links the eating of animals from leopard size upwards to the large cats.

question: Kedu ihe onye na-agba chaa chaa maara ihe kwesịrị ịnọpụ, dị ka akụkụ Akwụkwọ Nsọ si kwuo?

na-enyocha oge ma ọ bụ elekere
ịchọpụta ebe ọpụpụ kacha nso dị
reasoning:
Ihe nwere ike ime ka onye na-agba chaa chaa nke ọma ghara ịnọ n'ezi echiche bụ «mmanya ogbugbu» nke pụtara ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè. Ụlọ chaa chaa na-emekarị ka ndị na-agba chaa chaa na-emeghị nke ọma were ịnọgide na-anọ ebe ahụ, nke na-abụkarị site n'inyekwa ha mmanya na ngosi ntụrụndụ. Otú ọ dị, edebere na ndị maara ihe na-agba chaa chaa n’ezi echiche ma ghara ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè, maka na mmanya ogbugbu na-egbochi echiche ha. Nke a ziri ezi gbara aka ná ntị nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ na nkwupụta nke na onye na-agba chaa chaa maara ihe kwesịrị izere.

N'aka nke ọzọ:

- «ịnakwere ụgwọ ọrụ nke ụdị ọ bụla» adịghị egosi ihe gbasara inwe ezi echiche.

- «na-enyocha oge ma ọ bụ elekere» megidere nkọwa na ụlọ chaa chaa anaghị enye elekere.

- «ịchọpụta ebe ọpụpụ kacha nso dị» bụ ihe ụlọ chaa chaa na-eme mgbe ụfọdụ iji were jigide ndị ọbịa, ọ bụghị ihe onye na-agba chaa chaa kwesiri ime.

Ya mere, otu ihe Akwụkwọ Nsọ na-egosi bụ na mmanya ogbugbu (ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè) bụ ihe mmadụ kwesịrị izere.

question: Kedu oge bịara tupu afọ nke Templarsi?

passage: Ime egwuregwu n'ime ndagwurugwu (maọbụ: ime njegharị n'ime ndagwurugwu) bụ ihe gbasara ịga n’ala ala ndagwurugwu, nke nwere ike ịdị ọkọrọ maọbụ juputa na mmiri. question: Kedu n'ime ihe ndị a na-agaghị eme tupu ịmalite ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri?
reasoning:
The passage states that canyoning involves a combination of swimming, climbing, and descending, and it requires "obere ọzụzụ ma ọ bụ ọdịdị mma nke anụ ahụ imalite" which translates to "little training or good physical condition to start." passage: "Sikizm bụ okpukpe si mba India. O bidoro na mpaghara Pụnjab n'ahọ nke narị iri na ise site na nkesa ngalaba n'etiti omenala Hindu. Ndị Sikh ga-agwa gị na okpukpe ha na okpukpe Hindu abụghị otu ihe, mana ha kweere na ọ bụ n'okpukpe Hindu ka nke ha si pụta. Ndị Sikh na-akpọ okpukpe ha Gurmat, nke pụtara ""ụzọ nke guru"" na Punjabi. Guru so na ntọala nke okpukpe niile na India mana na Sikhism, ọ biaziri baa uru pụrụ iche nke gbasara isi okwu nke okwukwe ndị Sikh. Guru Nanak (1469–1539) bụ onye bidoro okpukpe a n'afọ narị iri na ise. Ndị guru itoolu sotere ya n'azụ."
question: N’isonye ka esi dee na mpaghara akwụkwọ a, olee edemede banyere Sikhismu na-akọwaghị okpukpechi ka osi di?
answer_list: Nkewa ọchịchị dị n’etiti omenala Hindu kpatara Sikhismi
Guru bụ mpaghara nwere ugwu na Sikhism
Ndị guru iteghete sochiri onye malitere okpukpechi, Guru Nanak
Ụfọdụ omenala ndị Sikhismi tinyere mkpọrọgwụ n’ okpukpechi ndị Hindu
reasoning:
The passage mentions that Sikhism is a religion that originated in the Punjab region in the fifteenth century and that it emerged from Hindu religious traditions. It specifically states that Sikhs do not consider their religion the same as Hinduism but believe it derives from it. This is clearly stated in the segment: "Ndị Sikh ga-agwa gị na okpukpe ha na okpukpe Hindu abụghị otu ihe, mana ha kweere na ọ bụ n'okpukpe Hindu ka nke ha si pụta." This means that Sikhism and Hinduism are not the same, but Sikhism has roots in Hinduism. This matches option 4, which says "Ụfọdụ omenala ndị Sikhismi tinyere mkpọrọgwụ n’ okpukpechi ndị Hindu," meaning that some Sikh traditions have roots in Hindu religion.

Option 1 discusses the political partition as the cause of Sikhism, which is not supported in the passage. Option 2 states that the guru is a respected position in Sikhism, but this is not about the "description of religion origin," but about a religious figure role, which the question explicitly asks about how Sikhism origin is narrated. Option 3 discusses the nine gurus following the founder Guru Nanak, which again is about religious figures, not about describing the religious origin or relation to Hinduism.

Therefore, option 4 is the only one that directly answers the question about how the passage describes Sikhism's relationship to Hinduism, denying that Sikhism is identical but acknowledging roots.

passage: Ihe mmụọ bụ ọgịga nke mmekọrịta nwere, njirimara nwere, maọbu ị mara nnụọ na ihe a dị adị, chi, mmụọ eziokwu, maọbụ Chineke. question: Kedu n'ime ihe ndị a na abụghị nkọwa ziri ezi maka Misticismi?

Ndịosiso Misticismi na-achọ ịmụta eziokwu nke mmụọ
Ndịosiso Misticismi nwere ike ịkwere usoro ndị ga-enyere aka ịzụlite nghọta ha n’ụzọ enweghị ntụpọ
A manyere atụ ọnụnụ ọkụ n’obi ịchọtarịrị ịheahụrụ nkeonwe na ọtụtụ ụdị nke nkwere okpukpechi na ifechi
reasoning:

Nke a pụtara na ọ bụ banyere atọpụ n'ime eziokwu nke mmụọ site n'ahụmihe onye nkeonwe. Ihe a kwuru na passage bụ na Misticismi bụ eziokwu na etinye uche na ntụgharị uche pụrụ iche na eziokwu nsinammụọ.

Lezienụ anya na nhọrọ ọ bụla:
1. «A na-enwe mmesi na-ịnweta usoro udo n’obi ụtọ nke amaghị ekere» — Nke a dakọtara na nkwupụta passage banyere ahụmihe nke obi ụtọ na ịhụnanya nke na-abụghị nke amama; ya bụ, ọ na-egosi isiokwu nke mmesi obi ụtọ nke amaghị ekere, nke nwere ike ịbụ nkọwa ziri ezi maka Misticismi.

Nke a pụtara na usoro nke "enweghị ntụpọ" ebighi ebi abụghị nke a kpọrọ aha na passage, yabụ ọ nwere ike bụrụ nkọwa na ezughị ezu.
4. «A manyere atụ ọnụnụ ọkụ n’obi ịchọtarịrị ịheahụrụ nkeonwe na ọtụtụ ụdị nke nkwere okpukpechi na ifechi» — Nke a pụtara ebube nke "'anyere nkwere okpukpechi na ifechi" ma ọ bụghị nkọwa nke Misticismi dịka passage siri kwuo. Passage na-ekwukwa na Misticismi bụ otu ụdị nke okwukwe okpukpe nke nwere kpọmkwem ahụmihe keonwe, ọ naghị ekwu na "a manyere" ha.

N'ihi nke a, nhọrọ nke atọ bụ nke adịghị ziri ezi doro anya, ebe ọ na-atụ aro uru nke usoro enweghị ntụpọ nke a anaghị ekwu kpọmkwem na passage, ma na nke anọ nwekwara ọdịiche na nkwupụta ahụ. Otú ọ dị, nhọrọ anọ bụ nke ọma ekwughi na ọ bụghị nkọwa ziri ezi ma e jiri ya tụnyere nhọrọ atọ.

Ya mere, nhọrọ nke abụghị nkọwa ziri ezi bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ 3.

passage: Dịka ikikere ịnweta ihe ọmụma na ịmụta ihe gbanwere etu e gosigoro ebe a, ego ọ na-efu ịmụta ihe gbanwere. Usoro e ji echeta ozi dị iche. question: Olee mba ka agha mbụ e nwere na Europe bụ nke e kwuru na ọ metụtara nkwudosi ike nke ụkpụrụọchịchị kama inwe ihe gbasara okpukpechi?

question: Kedu ihe ọkọlọtọ na-egosi n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ South Pole?

passage: Ndebanye aha so n'ihe a na-achọ n'usoro ịnweta visa. Na mba ụfọdụ, ị ghaghị ịdebanye ọnụnọ gị na adresi ebe i bi na nke ndị isi ala. Nke a nwere ike ịchọ idejupụta otu fọọm gị na ndị uwe ojii keobodo ma ọ bụ otu nleta na ụlọ ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ. N'ọtụtụ obodo nwere iwu dị otu ahụ, ụlọ nkwari akụ dị gburugburu ga-ahụ maka ndebanye aha (hụ na ịjụrụ ese) N'ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ, naanị ndị na-anọ na mpụga nke ụlọ ndị njem nleta bụ aghaghị ịdebanye aha. Agbanyeghị, nke a mere ka iwu dịkwuo mgbagwojuanya, ya mere chọpụta tupu oge eruo.
question: Kedụ nke n’ime ndị a abụghị ebe ndị mbịambịa njem nwere ike ịga jikwaa ndebanye aha ha?
reasoning: Ihe gbasara ndebanye aha ndị mbịambịa njem chọrọ esite na ndekọ ọnụnọ ha na adresi ebe ha bi ma ọ bụ ebe ndị isi ala dị. A na-akọwa na nke a nwere ike ime site n’idekọ aha na ndị uwe ojii keobodo ma ọ bụ site n’otu nleta na ụlọ ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ. Ụlọ nkwari akụ dị ọtụtụ mgbe na-ahụ maka ndebanye aha, nke pụtara na ndebanye aha nwere ike ịdị na ụlọ nkwari akụ ebe onye mbịambịa na-anọ. E wezụga nke ahụ, ụlọ ndị njem nleta nke bụ ndị na-anọ n'ime ha bụ ndị aghaghị ịdebanye aha. Mana ebe ọ bụla nke “Poostụ ọfịịsị otuebe” apụghị ịdabere na ya dịka ebe ndebanye aha maka ndị mbịambịa njem n’enweghị nkwupụta ọ bụla na nke a nọ n’akwụkwọ ahụ. Ebe ndị uwe ojii, ụlọ nkwari akụ, na ọfịịsị imigreshọn bụ kpọmkwem ebe e kwuru na ndebanye aha nwere ike ime, ebe poostụ ọfịịsị (post office) arụpụtara ọrụ a enweghị nkwupụta ọ bụla n’ime passage ahụ. Ya mere, nke abụghị ebe ndị mbịambịa njem nwere ike ịga jikwaa ndebanye aha ha bụ poostụ ọfịịsị otuebe.

passage: U.S. Onye isi oche Jiọj W. Bush batata Singapọ n'ụtụtụ ụbọchị nke iri na isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba, iji malite njem njegharị mba Eshia nke ga-anọzu otu izuụka. question: N'oge iji ha izizi rụọ ọrụ, olee n’ihe sọbụmarịnị nwere obere renji?
reasoning:
Ajụjụ jụrụ gbasara ihe nke dị obere renji n'oge ụgbọ okpuru mmiri ji arụ ọrụ izizi. N'akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ a sịrị, "N’oge ahụ ha na-aga nnọọ nwayọ ma nwekwaa ohere ọgbụgba pere mpe." Nke a pụtara na n'oge ha ji ụgbọ okpuru mmiri rụọ ọrụ izizi, ihe nwere obere renji bụ "ịga" ha, nke a kpọrọ ebe a “nnọọ nwayọ.” Nke a na-egosi na ọsọ njem ma ọ bụ ịnyagharị ha bụ ihe nwere obere renji. N'okwu ndị ọzọ a jụrụ n'ime nhọrọ, nke kachasị kwekọrọ bụ "Ịnyagharị" (ọ bụ ụzọ esi aga ma ọ bụ mmegharị na ịgagharị). 

Nke a bụ kpam kpam ziri ezi n'ihi na nke ọzọ ndị dị n'usoro azịza: "Ịme njem," "Ịgba ihe," na "Na-arụ ọrụ" anaghị egosipụta renji nke ọma dịka okwu ahụ si kwuo banyere ọsọ ma ọ bụ ụzọ. "Ịnyagharị" bụ nhọrọ kacha kwekọrọ n'ime okwu nke renji obere oge a kwuru, nke bụ "ịga nwayọ."

Ya mere, azịza kwesịrị ịbụ "Ịnyagharị" (ọ bụ nhọrọ nke 1).

question: Kedu ihe nwere ike isi ike ikwu okwu, dabere na akụkụ ahụ?
answer_list: ụda olu dị iche iche na nkebiokwu
reasoning:
Ihe na-esikarị ike ikwu okwu bụ agwaokwu, dịka e kwuru na passage: "Edemede na-adịkwakarị mfe nghọta karịa okwu ekwuru ekwu. Nke a bụ eziokwu n'ebe agwamokwu nọ; ha na-esikarị ike ịkpọpụta ọfụma." Nke a pụtara na okwu ekwuru mkpụrụokwu dị mgbagwoju anya ma sie ike ikwu nke ọma ma ghọta nke ọma karịsịa na akụkụ ha si na olu na ụda olu dị iche iche. Ndị a na-ezipụ na okwu ekwuru ma ọ bụ agwaokwu na-emepụta nsogbu n'ịkwu okwu nke ọma. Ọ bụkwa nke ahụ kpatara ndị mmadụ site n'obodo dị iche iche ji nwee ụda olu pụrụ iche, na-eme ka egwuregwu okwu ndị a sie ike maka onye si na mpaghara ọzọ ghọta. N'ịtụle nhọrọ ndị enyere, "ụda olu dị iche iche na nkebiokwu" bụ nhọrọ zuru oke nke na-ekwupụta nsogbu nke ikwu okwu na okwu ekwuru okwu siri ike, nke dabara na nke a kwuru na passage.

Options ndị ọzọ adịghị eme ka o doo anya na ha metụtara nsogbu nke ikwu okwu dị ka e si kọwaa ya n'ime passage:
- "Na-aza" adịghị ejikọ kpọmkwem na okwu nke ike ikwu okwu.
- "Asụsụ e dere ede" na-egosi na edemede dị mfe nghọta karịa okwu ekwuru, nke bụ akụkụ nke passage ma ọ bụghị ihe na-esiri ike ikwu okwu.
- "Slang mpaghara" anaghị ekwu maka nsogbu nke ikwu okwu ma ọ bụ ọdịiche ụda olu dị ka kwekọrọ na ajụjụ.

Ya mere, azịza ziri ezi bụ nke mbụ: «ụda olu dị iche iche na nkebiokwu».

question: Kedu ihe onye njem nwere ike ịzere na njem ụgbọ mmiri n'oge okpomọkụ, dị ka akụkụ ahụ si dị?

question: Kedu ihe ụfọdụ ndị bịaranụ chere na ọ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ahụmahụ na ememme egwu?

N'ịbụ na kampụ bụ ogige ndị dị nso n'ahụmahụ ahụ, ọ bụ ya mere na nhọrọ nke «Ogige ndị dị nso» bụ ezi azịza nke na-egosiputa nke ọma ihe ụfọdụ ndị bịara chere.

question: Kedu njirimara akpụkpọ ụkwụ na-eme ka nchekwa onye na-agba ya dịkwuo mma mgbe ị na-eji ihe mkpali?

Therefore, the correct answer is the one referring to "Akpụkpọ anụ" (leather), which is part of the horse-riding boots described for safety, especially due to its sole being soft and narrow.

question: Kedu ebumnuche nke iwu njem Ecuador na-abụghị maka ya?

question: Kedu mgbe mmadụ kwesịrị ịga Montevideo ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-ahọrọ okpomọkụ dị jụụ, dịka akụkụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ si kwuo?
answer_list: Mgbe Northern Hemisphere bụ n'oge okpomọkụ ya
Mgbe oge mmiri ozuzo Montevideo na-arụ ọrụ
reasoning:

Ọzọkwa, na oge okpomọkụ, okpomọkụ na Montevideo na-adịkarị karịa +30°C, nke nwere ike ịbụ oke okpomọkụ. Maka onye chọrọ okpomọkụ dị jụụ, ọ ga-abụrịrị na ọ chọrọ ịga n'oge oyi nke Montevideo, nke bụ n'oge Northern Hemisphere nwere okpomọkụ (oge okpomọkụ na Northern Hemisphere bụ oge oyi na Southern Hemisphere, nke Montevideo dị).

Ya bụ, onye chọrọ okpomọkụ dị jụụ kwesịrị ịga Montevideo mgbe Northern Hemisphere bụ n'oge okpomọkụ ya (ya bụ n'oge oge oyi Montevideo). Nke a dakọtara kacha mma na nhọrọ nke abụọ.

Ngwọta ndị ọzọ dị ka oge okpomọkụ Montevideo ma ọ bụ oge mmiri ozuzo adịghị ekweta onye chọrọ okpomọkụ dị jụụ n'ụzọ doro anya dịka akụkụ nke akwụkwọ si kọwaa.

Ya mere, azịza nke ziri ezi bụ: «Mgbe Northern Hemisphere bụ n'oge okpomọkụ ya» (oge oyi Montevideo).

question: Isonye ka akụkụ akwụkwọ ahụ si kwuo, kedụ ihe e ji ígwe emebe n’izizi?

question: Kedu onye nwere ike inye ọtụtụ kilomita efegharị ugboro ugboro, dabere n'ofe ahụ?

This suggests that although one might think that joining the flights one often uses is beneficial, the ability (or benefit) given varies and the places frequently traveled may reduce the advantage under the same airline agreement.

Option 2, "Iji otu njikọ ahụ, ụgbọ elu gị na-emekarị njem" ("Using the same connection, your flight is frequent") is partially aligned but does not specify who provides more kilometers.

Therefore, Option 3 best matches because it refers to different alliances (connections) supporting your most frequent flights, which implies the ability to provide multiple kilometers frequently.

passage: "Isi biya imeobodo ahụ bụ 'Number One', ọ bụghị biya na-agbagwoju anya, mana dị mma n'ahụ ma na-edo ahụ nke ọma. Biya imeobodo nke ọzọ bụ nke a na-akpọ ""Manta"". Mmiri mgbata ebeụlọ dị mma nke ọma ịn̄ụ, mana mmiri bọtụlụ dị mfe ịchọta ma ọ bụrụ na ụjọ na-atụ gị. Maka ndị Australia, kọfị 'flat white' bụ ihe ala ọzọ. Shọt blak bụ 'espresso', cappuccino na-ebu nnukwu krim abịa (ọ bụghị froth), ha na-añụ tii na-etinyeghị mmiri ara ehi. Chokoleeti ọkụ a ruru ogo nke Beljiọm. Mmanya mkpụrụ osisi dị ọnụ mana ha amaka."
question: Kedu ụdị mmanya ndị njem nlegharị anya na mmefu ego siri ike ga-achọ ịnọpụ na ya?
answer_list: Ihe ọṅụṅụ mere site na mkpụrụ osisi
reasoning: Ajụjụ ahụ jụrụ ka ụdị mmanya ndị njem na mmefu ego siri ike ga-achọ ịnọpụ na ya. N’akụkụ nke edere n’ime passage ahụ, e nwere okwu kwuru banyere mmanya na mmiri, ma nke kachasị kpọmkwem bụ, "Mmiri mgbata ebeụlọ dị mma nke ọma ịn̄ụ, mana mmiri bọtụlụ dị mfe ịchọta ma ọ bụrụ na ụjọ na-atụ gị." Nke a na-egosi na mmiri mkpọ (bottle water) bụ ihe a na-achọkarị ka e nwere dị ka nhọrọ maka ndị njem nke nwere mmefu ego siri ike na ndị na-ewe ụjọ. N'ụzọ ọzọ, e nweghị ntụaka kwụ ọtọ banyere ụdị mmanya ndị njem ga-achọ izere, kamakwa nke a bụ ihe kachasị doo anya gbasara ihe a kwesiri izere nke bụ "mmiri mkpọ" n’ihi na ọ bụ ihe dị mfe ịchọta ma zere nsogbu. Ụdị mmanya ndị e nwere mmasị na ha kwuru gbasara mmanya ime obodo ma ọ bụ mmanya si New Zealand na Australia (nke a bụ ihe a na-ezi obi ụtọ kama ọ bụghị ihe izere) na mmanya mkpụrụ osisi dị ọnụ ma amaka. Ya mere, ọ pụtara na ihe a na-achọ izere bụ "Mmiri mkpọ" ma ọ bụ ihe ndị dị mfe ma nwee ike ịbụ nsogbu n’ụzọ ụfọdụ. Otú ọ dị, n'ịtụgharị uche nke ọma na passage, "mmiri bọtụlụ dị mfe ịchọta ma ọ bụrụ na ụjọ na-atụ gị" pụtara na mmanya a na-atụ aro karịa mmiri bọtụlụ, nke pụtara na ndị njem nwere mmefu siri ike na njem nlegharị anya ga-achọ izere "mmiri bọtụlụ" n'ihi mmefu ha dị elu. N'ihe gbasara nkọwa nke mmanya, passage anaghị ekwu nke ọma ụdị mmanya ndị njem ga-achọ izere. Nke a na-eziga anyị na nhọrọ nke dị na ajụjụ, nke bụ "Mmiri mkpọ" bụ ihe a chọrọ ka ha izere ma ọ bụghị mmanya. N'ihi ya, nhọrọ "Mmiri mkpọ" bụ nke kpọmkwem metụtara ọnọdụ ndị njem na mmefu ego siri ike na-achọ ịzere.

passage: Na nguputa isi okwu ubochi Tozdee maka Ihe ngosi Egwuregwu Tokyo, onye isi Nintendo Satoru Iwata kpughere controller design ulo oru ya maka njikwa ohuru Nintendo Revolution.
